title: Academic Support Coordinator
company: ТОО Иностранное учебное заведение Coventry Kazakhstan
description:
About Us: 

Coventry University, founded in 1843, is a forward-looking, modern institution with a proud tradition of providing high-quality education. Students benefit from state-of-the-art equipment and facilities across various academic disciplines, including business, computing, health, design, engineering, and performing arts. Coventry University has been described by Times Higher Education as “one of the most innovative modern universities, bold in its vision of the 21st-century student experience”.

Position Overview: 

Academic Support Coordinator role focuses on enhancing student success through coordination of academic advising, tutoring, mentoring, and student support services. The successful candidate will manage key academic processes, support communication between students and faculty, and contribute to data-driven improvements in academic support.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Academic Support Services

Timetabling of tutoring, mentoring, and academic coaching schedules

Coordinate and maintain the Academic Support webpage, ensuring regular updates and improvements.

Offer guidance and support to students regarding academic support processes and policies.

Manage the department’s document register and ensuring accurate recordkeeping.

Process Enrolment Verification Certificate requests for students.

2. Resource Development

Maintain academic support materials, including study guides, handouts, and online resources.

Work with faculty to identify students who may benefit from additional academic support.

3. Program Coordination and Implementation

Track student progress and provide data on the effectiveness of academic support services.

Organise and facilitate peer mentoring and study group programs.

4. Communication and Outreach

Promote academic support services and resources through campus events, workshops, and outreach activities.

Communicate with students, faculty, and staff about available academic support services.

Respond to inquiries from students regarding academic challenges and support options.

5. Assessment and Reporting

Assist in assessing the needs of students and evaluating the success of academic support services.

Prepare reports on student participation and success in academic support programs.

Contribute to the continuous improvement of academic support programs based on feedback and data analysis.

6. Collaboration

Serve as the Secretary of the Extenuating Circumstances Committee, including validation of student sick leaves and communication with faculty.

Secretary for the Student Disciplinary Committee, supporting documentation, communication, and meeting coordination.

Organise meetings with students and faculty upon request and keeping detailed records of student interactions.

Manage room bookings and maintain the room booking webpage.

Provide translation support for institutional policies, procedures, and other documentation.

Work closely with academic departments, student affairs, and other campus resources to identify and address student needs.

Serve as a liaison between students and faculty to foster academic success.

Collaborate with faculty and staff to identify at-risk students and provide timely interventions.

7. Other Duties

Attend staff meetings, training sessions, and professional development opportunities.

Perform other duties as assigned by the Department Head.

Qualifications:

Required:

• Bachelor's degree in Education, or a related field (Master's preferred).

• Previous experience in academic advising, tutoring, or student support services.

• Possess strong academic knowledge and prior experience in academic support roles at

internationally recognised universities.

• Strong knowledge of academic support strategies, learning styles, and student success

initiatives.

• Excellent communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills.

• Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Preferred:

• Master’s degree in a relevant field.

• Experience in higher education or a student support-related role.

• Familiarity with student success software and learning management systems (LMS).

• Experience with data collection, analysis, and reporting.

If you're passionate about supporting student achievement and thrive in a dynamic academic environment, we invite you to apply.
skills: Academic Advising and Student Support,Strong Communication and Interpersonal Skills,Organisational and Time Management Abilities,Data Tracking and Reporting,Collaboration and Stakeholder Engagement

title: Strategic Product Analyst
description:
G5 Gamesis a Swedish developer and publisher of mobile games played by over 250 million people worldwide. We create large-scale projects, such as Sherlock, Hidden City®, Jewels of Rome®, and continuously improve their technical aspects.

We are strengthening our team and looking for a Strategic Product Analyst to drive research, analyze key metrics, and uncover growth opportunities.. If you are interested in working as an analyst with exciting challenges — we’d love to have you on our team!

What You Will Work On:

Interact directly with VP of Product, Product and Design Directors and company’s lead analyst.
Conduct independent analytical researches and look for potential growth opportunities.
Analyze financial and game indicators of different game projects.
Find ways to increase the basic project indicators.
Generate and validate product hypotheses.
Participate in strategic planning for company’s games.

What We Expect:

At least 2 years of working experience as an analyst in the gaming or IT industry.
Knowledge of KPIs for IT projects (ARPU, ARPPU, average check etc.).
Basic knowledge in F2P game design and monetization.
Basic understanding of game performance marketing process and KPIs.
Knowledge of the Foundations of Probability Theory and Statistics.
Knowledge of R/Python and experience of using these languages for data handling.
Knowledge of SQL basics.

Would Be a Plus:

Experience in hands-on application of statistical analysis methods.
Experience in hands-on plotting of predictive mathematical models.

What We Offer:

Flexible Work Conditions – Fully remote format with no office restrictions. Convenient flexible schedule and transparent processes.
Development & Learning – Internal education system that includes workshops, webinars, and hackathons. Compensation for English and other language courses.
Relocation Support – Financial assistance and guidance at every step, from choosing a country (where G5 has offices) to legalizing your entire family.
Health & Well-being – Medical insurance and reimbursement for gym memberships. Team sports initiatives to promote a healthy lifestyle.
Bonus Program – Performance-based bonuses upon meeting sales targets. For key employees—profit-sharing from stock value growth.
Expert Community – Work alongside top industry professionals. Grow in a dynamic and innovative environment.

title: Системный аналитик в SEP
ML Engineer [Middle]
description:
Are you an ML Engineer excited by the potential of Large Language Models (LLMs)? Do you enjoy the challenge of crafting effective prompts and using NLP to make AI-generated text more natural and useful?

We are looking for a motivated Middle Machine Learning Engineer to contribute significantly to our Generative AI initiatives. In this role, you'll focus on the practical application of LLMs and NLP techniques. You will develop and refine prompts for text and image generation, implement methods to improve the quality of AI-generated language, and collaborate closely with the team to integrate these capabilities into our products.

What You'll Do:

Develop and Refine Prompts: Design, test, and iterate on prompts for various LLMs and image generation models to meet specific project requirements for quality, style, and relevance. Contribute to our prompt libraries.
Implement NLP for Text Refinement: Apply and test NLP techniques (e.g., style analysis, coherence checks, sentiment tuning) to improve the fluency, consistency, and overall quality of AI-generated text.
Evaluate Model Outputs: Implement and utilize evaluation frameworks (using both automated metrics and contributing to human assessment processes) to measure the performance of prompts and generated content.
Experiment with Models: Work with state-of-the-art models, run experiments, analyze results, and contribute findings back to the team. Assist in integrating validated models/techniques into applications.
Collaborate Effectively: Partner with senior engineers, product managers, software engineers, and designers to understand requirements, implement solutions, and deliver features.
Contribute & Learn: Actively participate in team discussions, share learnings, stay updated on new developments in GenAI/NLP, and contribute to our codebase and best practices.
Deliver Impact: Your contributions will directly impact the quality of our AI-generated content, the success of feature integrations, and user satisfaction.


What You'll Need (Essential Skills):

Relevant ML/NLP Experience: Typically 2+ years of hands-on experience working with Machine Learning concepts, with a focus on Natural Language Processing or Large Language Models gained through projects or professional roles.
Strong Python Skills: Proficiency in Python is essential, including practical experience with relevant ML/NLP libraries (e.g., Hugging Face Transformers, PyTorch or TensorFlow, NLTK/spaCy).
Hands-On Prompt Engineering Experience: Demonstrable experience designing and testing prompts for text generation with LLMs. Experience with image generation prompting is a strong plus.
Applied NLP Fundamentals: Good understanding and ability to apply core NLP techniques relevant to analyzing or improving text quality (e.g., text classification, embeddings, basic sequence analysis).
LLM Interaction: Experience interacting with common LLMs (via API or locally) and understanding their practical strengths and weaknesses.
Problem-Solving Ability: Capable of debugging technical issues, implementing solutions based on defined requirements, and analyzing experiment results.
Good Communication Skills: Ability to explain your work, participate in technical discussions, and collaborate effectively within the team.

​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Conditions

Service agreement
Remote work
Hourly rate payment ($$/hour)

title: System analyst
description:
Join Netcracker Technology to work for a forward-looking software company that offers mission-critical BSS/OSS solutions to service providers around the globe. Our comprehensive portfolio of software solutions and professional services enables large-scale digital transformations, unlocking the opportunities of the cloud, analytics, virtualization, and 5G mobile networks. With an unbroken service delivery track record of over 25 years, our unique combination of technology, people, and expertise helps companies transform their networks and improve customer experiences.

We are currently looking for a System Analyst.

About the Role:

As a System Analyst you will provide both system and business analysis of our products to meet project and customer goals. You will participate in the solution analysis and design stage on Netcracker product and Customer projects.
Your role involves in-depth collaboration with stakeholders, including architects, business analysts, and developers from different teams within the company.
Your main goal is to understand their needs and translate these into robust and effective system designs and business deliverable documentation.
You will work on design and customization of mission-critical solutions to world-leading telecom companies.
You will be part of the high-level concept development and will be delivering the detailed design for external/internal projects.

Key Responsibilities:

Collaborate with stakeholders to identify and document business needs, objectives, and processes, understand requirements/problems coming from internal teams and customer business.
Translate business requirements into detailed functional and technical specifications using industry-standard artifacts like Use Cases, Activity Diagrams, Sequence Flows, Entity-Relationship Diagrams, and Data Flow Diagrams.
Deliver, present, and justify documents containing end-to-end high-level functional requirements and low-level designs.
Configure Netcracker product as per customer requirements using built-in toolset.
Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, QA testers, and project managers, to ensure successful implementation of internal products and customer solutions in different areas.
Contribute to Netcracker product development to ensure that the OOB solution meets current industry needs.
Be customer-focused, constantly explore to conceptualize and understand customer needs.
Mentor fellow team members and actively participate in building the local team of analysts, organizing the process of onboarding, continuous training, and skillset improvements.

What we are looking for:

Software Release Process Understanding: understanding of business/system analyst and other roles in software companies; knowledge of SDLC practices, experience with Confluence, Jira.
Business Analysis: knowledge and experience in business process modeling (BPMN), requirements elicitation techniques; excellent presentation skills.
System Design: knowledge and demonstrated experience of designing systems using system design principles and best practices; proficiency in Unified Modeling Language (UML) and Data-Modelling.
Architecture: knowledge and demonstrated experience (desirable) of designing and delivering products within microservice architecture; knowledge of monolithic approach principles and service-oriented architecture
System Integration: knowledge and proficiency with APIs, RestFul, GraphQL, AsyncAPI, GRPc and etc, with experience of tools like Postman, Swagger.
Version Control Systems: proficiency in Git or SVN for managing system changes and collaborating on projects.
System Thinking: strong ability to approach architectural design in a structured and methodical manner.
Communication Skills: ability to communicate effectively with various stakeholders; manage expectations.
Proactive Attitude: demonstrating a proactive approach in all aspects of work.
Language: Intermediate+ level of English (verbal communication as well as writing skills).
Toolset: Expirience in JSON, YAML, Markdown, Confluence.

It will be to your advantage if you are: proficient in SQL for querying databases; having experience in working with UX/UI tools like Figma; familiar with programming languages.

We offer:

Competitive salary
Medical insurance
More than 300 hard and soft-skills programs by the corporate career development center
Open environment and encouraging knowledge sharing culture
Unlimited opportunities for professional and career development in a global company

title: SMM-менеджер
description:
DeutschKZ — это ведущая школа немецкого языка в Казахстане, специализирующаяся не только на обучении немецкому, но и на комплексном сопровождении клиентов для достижения их целей в Германии.

Наша основная миссия — помочь людям открыть новые возможности, будь то обучение, работа или переезд в Германию. Мы предоставляем услуги по языковой подготовке, документальному сопровождению, подготовке к экзаменам и курсам интеграции.

Чем мы гордимся:

• Ежегодно более 2 500 успешных поступлений в университеты Германии.

• Сотрудничество с проверенными партнерами и образовательными учреждениями в Германии.

• Курсы, адаптированные для разных уровней: от новичков до профессионалов, включая специализированные языковые программы для врачей, инженеров и студентов.

• Дружелюбная и профессиональная команда, которая помогает нашим клиентам достичь мечты.

DeutschKZ — это больше, чем школа. Это путь в новую жизнь через немецкий язык!

Требования к кандидату:

• Обязательный опыт работы в сфере образования (СММ для образовательных проектов).

• Умение разрабатывать и реализовывать стратегии для продвижения бренда в соцсетях.

• Опыт ведения и продвижения аккаунтов в Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, YouTube.

• Навыки монтажа видео (сторис, рилс, рекламные ролики).

• Способность создавать качественный контент (тексты, визуалы, видео).

• Знание инструментов аналитики (Google Analytics, Meta Ads Manager) и умение работать с рекламными кабинетами.

• Грамотная речь (русский и казахский); знание немецкого языка будет преимуществом.

• Креативный подход, ответственность, умение работать в команде и многозадачность.

Обязанности:

• Разработка и реализация стратегии продвижения в соцсетях.

• Ежедневное ведение аккаунтов: публикации, сторис, рилс, а также создание видео-контента.

• Монтаж видео для рекламных кампаний, сторис и обучающих материалов.

• Планирование и проведение рекламных кампаний для привлечения новых учеников.

• Анализ эффективности контента и рекламных кампаний: охваты, вовлеченность, конверсии.

• Взаимодействие с аудиторией: ответы на комментарии и сообщения.

• Мониторинг конкурентов и актуальных трендов в образовательном СММ.

Условия работы:

• График: 5/2, с 10:00 – 19:00 (с возможностью частичной удаленной работы).

• Офис в удобном месте: г. Астана, Кунаева 12/1, БЦ “Trust”.

• Дружный коллектив и возможность профессионального роста.

• Фиксированный оклад (Обсуждается на интервью)

Почему DeutschKZ?

• Мы помогаем людям реализовать мечту об обучении и работе в Германии.

• Стабильная компания с проверенной репутацией и профессиональной командой.

• Возможность быть частью масштабного образовательного проекта с реальными результатами.

• Открытость к идеям и поддержка развития сотрудников.

Отправляйте ваше резюме прямо сейчас и начните свою историю в DeutschKZ!

title: Specialist-Tenant Relations-Abu Dhabi Plaza
description:
Responsibilities:

- To be a deputy/replacement in case of absence of Senior Manager – Tenant Relations, in all issues between Landlord and Retail Tenants, but not limited to, in conjunction with other departments.

- Coordinate all necessary retail lease management obligations and communications with tenants including penalty regulations.

- Support the Senior Manager – Tenant Relations in developing Tenant Performance Program.

- Ensure all tenants are complying with the Tenant Handbook and also ensure any operational requirements for tenants (fire lif safety obligations, maintenance obligations, etc..) are managed and appropriate communication process are put in place.

- Review overall retail footfall figures and detailed footfall analysis on store by store, zone and floor, analyse patterns and in conjunction with Marketing develop mitigation strategy measures (Retail Ops/Marketing) to improve footfall utilisation across the asset.

- Obtain monthly sales figures from all tenants, analyse patterns and in conjunction with Marketing and Tenants develop mitigation measures to improve sales.

- Utilising Footfall analysis, develop and implement commercialization strategy for Abu Dhabi Plaza.

- To be responsible for arrangement of Mystery Shopper program regularly.

- Assume daily point of contact for retailer relationship management for the mall tenant portfolio to include dissemination of information and the collection of sales data from tenants.

- Serve as an effective BI resource in providing wrap-around communication between tenants and all functional mall teams.

- Work with the Abu Dhabi Plaza Management Team to resolve issues with tenants; track, implement shop level tenant visitation schedule; conduct environmental sensing, analyze content and render recommendations;

- Research and gather Tenants' related information.

- Leasing support. Participation in leasing activities in commercial assets.

- Work intimately with Customer Service to identify and resolve common customer-tenant issues.

- Provide tenants with general information and conduct daily mall site walks

- Ensure all tenants and key stakeholders adhere to lease requirements in relation to standards and product offer.

- Lead Retailer On-Boarding, induction and orientation” training protocols to ensure an familiarity with Abu Dhabi Plaza policies and procedures.

- Generate Tenant Activity Management Reports and recommendations.

- Provide input to the Tenant Handbook.

- Updating the contact list and liaising with the Mall Tenants.

- Assist in the dissemination of information to the tenants on all operational matters

- Orchestrate effective relationships across tenants, landlord, customers, cross-functional staff, and broader community.

- Assist in the design, implementation and evaluation of tenant satisfaction survey.

- Recommend improvement initiatives based on survey results, site visits and tenants feedback.

Requirements:
Min of: 3+ years of experience in customer management, Tenant Relations in property management, hospitality or asset management business, large mixed-se development or malls.
Experience in lease development associated with large commercial facilities (eg. centers, malls, airports)

TECHNICAL AND INTERPERSONAL SKILLS

- Effective new account development skills; presentation and closing competencies.

- Responsive in engineering high output opportunity management.

- Ability to liaise and interact effectively with diverse audiences.

- Excellent Verbal and written communication skills

- Attention to detail and good Information management skills

QUALIFICATION

- Bachelors degree in business administration, marketing, finance or a related field

title: Специалист поддержки IT
company: ТОО ЧАСТНАЯ КОМПАНИЯ EA GROUP HOLDING LTD.
description:
Общая цель позиции

Специалист поддержки IT отвечает за обеспечение бесперебойной работы ИТ-инфраструктуры компании, техническую поддержку сотрудников, настройку и сопровождение рабочих станций, офисного оборудования, локальной сети и доступа к сервисам. Его миссия — обеспечить быстрое реагирование на инциденты, эффективную поддержку пользователей и стабильную работу ИТ-среды.

Основные обязанности

Поддержка пользователей (1-я и 2-я линия):

Приём и обработка заявок от сотрудников через helpdesk или напрямую.

Настройка, диагностика и устранение проблем с рабочими станциями (Windows/Linux).

Установка, обновление и удаление программного обеспечения.

Консультирование сотрудников по вопросам работы с ИТ-системами и сервисами.

Обслуживание офисной инфраструктуры:

Поддержка офисной техники: принтеров, сканеров, МФУ.

Настройка рабочих мест, подключение периферии.

Управление офисной сетью: Wi-Fi, Ethernet, маршрутизаторы, коммутаторы.

Диагностика и устранение сетевых сбоев.

Администрирование и доступ:

Управление доступами к корпоративным сервисам (почта, облачные хранилища, VPN, Passbolt и др.).

Создание и удаление учётных записей, настройка прав доступа.

Поддержка внутренних инструментов (в том числе систем Odoo, OpenProject, Superset и пр.) совместно с DevOps.

Безопасность и резервное копирование:

Обеспечение антивирусной защиты и регулярного обновления ПО.

Участие в мониторинге и устранении инцидентов информационной безопасности.

Сопровождение процедур резервного копирования (по регламенту).

Документация и процессы:

Ведение документации по ИТ-инфраструктуре, настройкам и инцидентам.

Участие в разработке и поддержке внутренних ИТ-регламентов и инструкций.

Ведение учёта ИТ-оборудования и лицензий.

Требования к квалификации

Обязательные:

Опыт работы в сфере IT-поддержки от 1 года.

Знание Windows 10/11, Linux (Ubuntu, Debian) на уровне пользователя/администратора.

Уверенные навыки работы с офисной техникой, ЛВС и периферийными устройствами.

Понимание принципов сетей: IP-адресация, DNS, DHCP, VPN.

Опыт установки и обновления прикладного ПО.

Навыки работы с сервисами удалённого доступа и администрирования (RDP, AnyDesk, SSH).

Будет плюсом:

Опыт работы с Odoo, MS Office 365/Exchange.

Навыки работы с Active Directory, LDAP, Passbolt, Keycloak.

Знание базовых принципов информационной безопасности.

Умение вести учёт техники, лицензий и составлять ИТ-документацию.

Английский язык на уровне чтения технической документации.

Контекст и условия

Работа в инновационной компании, развивающей BI-платформу DataWiz.

Взаимодействие с разработчиками, DevOps-инженерами и аналитиками.

Гибридный формат поддержки: локальные рабочие места и удалённые сотрудники.

Возможность развиваться в сторону системного администрирования, DevOps или ИБ.

Поддержка профессионального роста и сертификаций (CompTIA, Linux+, Azure Fundamentals и др.).

title: Ведущий специалист по разработке BI систем
description:
Обязанности и требования:

Знание технологий BI: Глубокое знание инструментов BI, таких как Tableau, Power BI, QlikView, MicroStrategy и т. д. Умение создавать отчеты, дашборды и аналитические модели с использованием этих инструментов.
Знание баз данных: Понимание принципов работы баз данных и SQL. Опыт работы с различными типами баз данных, включая реляционные и NoSQL.
Навыки программирования: Знание языков программирования, таких как SQL, а также знание ETL-инструментов и навыки работы с данными, процессами извлечения, преобразования и загрузки данных (ETL), включая использование инструментов ETL, таких как Microsoft SSIS, Apache NiFi, Talend или других.
Моделирование данных: Умение проектировать и разрабатывать модели данных для BI-систем, включая структуры хранилищ данных (Data Warehousing) и интеграцию данных.
Аналитические навыки: Способность анализировать данные, выявлять тренды и понимать потребности бизнеса для разработки подходящих BI-решений.
Коммуникативные навыки: Умение эффективно коммуницировать с бизнес-пользователями для понимания их потребностей, а также с другими членами команды разработки.
Лидерские качества: Возможность руководить проектами, организовывать работу команды и управлять процессом разработки BI-систем.
Готовность постоянно обучаться и развиваться в области бизнес-аналитики, следить за новыми тенденциями и технологиями и адаптировать их для решения бизнес-задач.
Опыт работы: Требуется опыт работы в области BI, внедрение/разработка и аналитика данных. от 5 лет и более.

Мы предлагаем:

Стабильная заработная плата - до 10 числа каждого месяца без задержек на карту банков Kaspi.kz, Altyn или Halyk bank - на выбор;
Стандартный соц. пакет: ОПВ, ИПН, ОСМС;
Оплачиваемые отпуска, больничные и возложения обязанностей;
Подарки от компании детям сотрудников на Новый год;
Материальная помощь от компании;
Гибридный график работы.

Имеется возможность работать удаленно (регламентированный рабочий день с 09.00 до 18.00)

title: Brand Executive SFP KZ
Менеджер проектов
salary: от 400 000 до 800 000 ₸ за месяц, на руки
description:
Sergek Group – казахстанская группа IT-компаний. Наши сотрудники – это разработчики программного обеспечения, компьютерного зрения и искусственного интеллекта, опытные проектные и продуктовые менеджеры, системные аналитики, бизнес аналитики, дата аналитики, финансовые, экономические и кадровые специалисты, юристы, закупщики, сотрудники HR, PR и GR. title: Senior Разработчик в Управление развития Data Governance
Senior machine learning engineer - financial applications
description:
Investbanq is an AI-powered wealth operating system for family offices, asset managers and banks. We are empowering traditional financial institutions to rapidly transform into AI-driven WealthTech players, enabling them to effectively capitalize on the growing wealth transfer to affluent millennials and other digital natives across emerging Asia and MENA. We are scaling quickly across Asia and MENA and are assembling a high‑calibre engineering team to power our next phase of growth.

Job overview

We are looking for a technically skilled and entrepreneurial Senior Machine Learning Engineer to drive the development of advanced AI and machine learning solutions for financial applications. You will take charge of building, deploying, and maintaining innovative models for portfolio optimization, forecasting, and risk management. In this role, you will manage the entire product development lifecycle—from writing extensive code and designing robust algorithms to ensuring that project milestones and stakeholder expectations are met.

Key responsibilities

End-to-end product development
research, design, code, test, and deploy machine learning models and services tailored for financial applications such as portfolio construction and market forecasting
Take complete ownership of projects from concept through production, ensuring high-quality, scalable, and maintainable solutions
Technical innovation & problem solving
leverage state-of-the-art techniques to solve complex challenges in financial analytics
continuously research and implement new methodologies to enhance model accuracy and efficiency
Team engagement
collaborate with internal stakeholders to gather requirements, manage expectations, and translate business needs into technical solutions
communicate complex technical concepts clearly to non-technical audiences and ensure alignment with business objectives
Data governance & compliance
ensure that all solutions adhere to stringent data security, governance, and regulatory standards prevalent in the financial sector
implement rigorous testing and monitoring frameworks to maintain system integrity and performance

Qualifications

Education
degree (Bachelor’s, Master’s or Ph.D.) in Computer Science, Data Science, Machine Learning, Financial Engineering, or a related field
Experience
5+ years of hands-on experience in AI, machine learning, or data science roles, with demonstrable experience in building and deploying production-grade models
prior exposure to the financial sector, especially in areas such as time series forecasting, portfolio optimization, and quantitative analysis
Technical skills (must have)
strong proficiency in coding with languages such as Python
extensive experience with machine learning frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, scikit-learn)
solid background in data architecture, big data technologies, and cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
working knowledge of financial analytics, risk modeling, and quantitative finance methodologies
experience with large language models (LLMs) and frameworks such as LangChain, LlamaIndex, etc.
Good to have
experience with convex optimization techniques to refine portfolio management strategies
familiarity with financial econometrics or related quantitative finance methods

What we offer

Hybrid - 3 days in the office per week
Location: Almaty, Gagarin Av., 310
Employment status: Official, in accordance with the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan

title: HSE Manager
description:
Efes Kazakhstan takes a leading position in the beer market of Kazakhstan. The company is a member of Efes Beer Group, which is a multinational group in the beverage industry specializing in the production and sale of beer and non-alcoholic beverages in Turkey, Eastern Europe and the CIS. Efes Kazakhstan owns two beer production plants in Almaty and Karaganda, as well as regional representative offices in Kazakhstan. We are glad to invite candidates to consider our vacancy of Health and Safaty manager,to ensure strategic and operational management in the fields of occupational health and safety, industrial safety, and to develop unified occupational safety standards across the company and at productions of Efes Kazakhstan.

Responsibilities:

Develop and implement the company’s strategy and unified corporate standards in occupational health, industrial, and fire safety in accordance with local legislation and international requirements.
Define performance indicators for monitoring HSE effectiveness and ensure compliance through the use of modern information technologies.
Ensure compliance with the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan in the field of occupational health and safety, industrial safety, and fire protection at all organizational levels.
Coordinate the activities of H&S departments at two production sites (indirect leadership) and support the development of employees’ professional competencies.
Organize the collection, analysis, and digital reporting of key occupational health and safety metrics. Initiate necessary actions based on the data.
Monitor changes in regulatory frameworks and implement best international practices. Drive continuous improvement processes within the H&S system.
Integrate risk management practices into HSE processes to identify, assess, and mitigate potential hazards and ensure proactive safety planning.
Collaborate with the Efes Group H&S Manager to effectively implement corporate standards at the local sites.
Ensure timely communication, reporting, and coordination of all incidents related to health and safety (including fires, floods, earthquakes, etc.) with both internal and external stakeholders.
Develop and implement training programs in occupational health and safety for both blue-collar and technical/engineering staff. Organize induction training, regular safety briefings, training sessions, and knowledge assessments.
Create and execute schedules for internal audits and HSE inspections. Monitor the implementation of corrective and preventive actions.
Organize workplace assessments, including measurement of harmful and hazardous factors, and ensure certification of workplaces and equipment in compliance with occupational health and safety standards.

Requirements:

Higher education in a technical, environmental, or related field (Occupational Health and Safety, Industrial Safety, Environmental Science).

At least 5 years of experience in a leadership role in HSE, preferably in a manufacturing environment.

Knowledge of the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan, as well as international standards (ISO).

Proven experience in developing and implementing HSE strategies at the level of a large enterprise or corporate group.

Strong managerial skills, with the ability to make decisions and take responsibility for their implementation.

Effective communication and collaboration skills with various levels of management, external auditors, and government authorities.

Proficiency in English is required.

Willingness to travel for business trips.

We offer:

Work in a big international FMCG Company;

Competitive salary;

Expanded social benefits package (Corporate car, medical insurance, mobile communication, meal allowance) + Flexible benefits;

Recognition and incentive programs;

Corporate programs of professional training and development of employees;

Opportunities for professional and career growth;

Opportunity to work with Big-name brands and contribute to brand building.

title: Senior Consultant - Forensic - FAS
Senior Lawyer
description:
Caravan Resources Group is a dynamic group of companies engaged in mining, construction, and industrial design. We specialize in the production of copper and gold cathodes and deliver high-quality engineering and construction services for industrial projects in the mining sector.
Our assets are located in three regions of Kazakhstan: Ulytau Region, Karaganda Region, and Kostanay Region. Exploration activities are currently ongoing in the Kostanay Region.

Position Summary:
We are looking for a highly experienced Senior Lawyer to provide legal support across various projects and transactions. The successful candidate will play a key role in drafting, reviewing, and negotiating contracts, ensuring compliance with legal and regulatory frameworks, and mitigating legal risks. This position requires strong analytical skills, legal expertise, and the ability to collaborate across departments.

Responsibilities
Draft, review, and negotiate contracts and transaction-related documents (e.g. agreements, term sheets).
Provide legal support for project financing, mergers and acquisitions, joint ventures, and strategic partnerships.
Conduct legal due diligence and assess legal risks for ongoing and potential projects.
Ensure compliance with applicable local and international legislation and internal company policies.
Advise senior management and project teams on legal risks and implications.
Collaborate with external legal counsel on complex matters when necessary.
Monitor legal and regulatory developments and recommend updates to internal practices and documentation.
Maintain organized records and support internal audits where needed.

Requirements

Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Law; additional qualifications in corporate or commercial law are a plus.
At least 6 years of relevant legal experience, preferably in corporate, transactional, or project-based legal roles.
Strong knowledge of corporate, contract, and commercial law.
Proven experience negotiating and drafting complex contracts, particularly in mining, construction, or finance sectors.
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to convey legal concepts to non-legal stakeholders.
Strong analytical mindset and meticulous attention to detail.
Fluency in English (written and spoken); knowledge of Kazakh and/or Russian is a plus.

Conditions

Competitive salary package.
Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement.
A collaborative, innovative, and supportive work environment.
Participation in impactful, high-level industrial projects.

title: Junior Python Developer
description:
Improvado is an AI-powered, unified platform designed for marketing teams in medium to large-scale enterprises and agencies, who are looking to automate complex marketing intelligence and reporting to make decisions with ease. Improvado gathers, organizes, and untangles marketing data to deliver instant insights through BI and AI, helping to eliminate complexity, delivering laser-focused insights to optimize budgets, enhance campaign efficiency and marketing ROI.

As a rapidly scaling Series A startup that raised $34 million in funding, we're proud to partner with globally recognized brands such as ASUS, Docker, Activision, H&R Block, and many others. Our diverse team of curious, open, and hard-working individuals is committed to cultivating a fast-paced, agile culture that values personal and professional growth.

About the role

We have an incredibly talented team working really hard to make our product helpful to our clients businesses and we are looking for people who are willing to join our team working hard on cutting edge of technology to deliver amazing products for the world famous brands.

Responsibilities:

Build and maintain back-end for Improvado's marketing analytics SaaS platform (including architectural improvements regarding scalability, reliability and performance)
Design and Implement new functionalities
Write tests using Pytest and other libraries
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
Optimize performance of services to ensure fast and responsive user experience
Troubleshoot and debug issues as they arise
Collaborate with the front-end team to integrate with the server-side logic
Participate in code reviews and contribute to overall codebase improvements
Participate in Agile development methodology, including daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives
Participate in knowledge sharing with the team


Requirements:

Basic knowledge of Python or 1 year in a role focused on Python backend development (perfectly with Django framework)
Higher education (3rd-4th year students) in the field of Computer Science
Comfortable working with Linux
Knowledge of Databases (PostgreSQL, Clickhouse, NoSQL databases)
Ready to work with the team distributed among different timezones
Strong mathematical background and Software Engineering is your true passion
Curious and always learning upcoming best practices

Nice to have:

Experience in high-load/BigData, and REST projects
Knowledge and experience in implementation of algorithms and design patterns
Knowledge of such conceptions as OOP, Solid, DDD
Experience with PostgreSQL, Redis, RabbitMQ, Amazon Web Services, Docker, and Kubernetes.
Experience with asyncio, or similar frameworks
Ability to work in a Continuous Integration environment

Why Improvado

Fully remote position (with flexible working hours)
Strong product/market fit: marketing data product for US-based enterprises
27 days of PTO per year
Optional relocation to Latin America after successful completion of the probationary period
Extremely fun & open startup environment
Professional development reimbursement
Chance to get the company's stock options in the future

title: Data Governance Manager (Azerbaijan)
description:
KPMG is currently seeking a Data Governance Manager to join our Technology Consulting team in Azerbaijan.

Requirements:

A minimum of 3 years of experience in DG, EDM, or a similar field
Bachelor's degree in a technical or quantitative field
Knowledge in areas such as DG, data quality, metadata management, master data management, data architecture, and data management principles
Proven expertise in designing and implementing DG frameworks and EDM solutions, with strong project management skills
Demonstrated ability to leverage market leading DG tools for data cataloging, data lineage, data quality monitoring, and policy management
Demonstrated ability to manage engagements and communicate with clients
Sector-specific or process-specific experience in DG. In-depth knowledge of data management and DG best practices and regulatory landscapes
Expertise in organization design, governance framework design/execution, workstream management, and strong business consulting skills. Extensive project management, client handling, and executive communication capabilities (e.g., interviews, workshop management, business writing)
Excellent knowledge of SQL
Experience with BI analytics tools (Power BI, Tableau, Qlik, etc.) is an advantage
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Azerbaijani languages, knowledge of Turkish or Russian is an advantage
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent knowledge of MS Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Visio, etc.).

Responsibilities:

Drive data governance (DG) and enterprise data management (EDM) transformation, solution design engagements, by developing and implementing enterprise-wide data governance frameworks in alignment with regulatory and business needs
Develop requirements for DG frameworks and EDM practices, including the integration and implementation of market leading tools such as Informatica, Atacama, etc. Define, implement, and monitor DG rules, policies, and key metrics
Assess DG maturity level using models like CMMI DMM, KPMG ADM, etc.
Drive data domain setups and glossary entries for business terms according to processes
Perform data quality studies (data profiling, business rule definition, data quality rule definition, measurement of rule scores)
Communicate with the client’s leadership and representatives to manage their expectations. Apply DG and EDM concepts to address business problems, demonstrating how data management can enhance business value
Manage DG and EDM related projects (interviews, workshops, surveys, market research, evaluate readiness for DG and data transformation strategies, etc.).
Support project leaders in tracking and communicating project risks, budgets, etc. Ensure the quality of deliverables, coordinated teams, and successful project execution
Business development in the DG service areas, commercial offers and conduct presentations of services to the clients, identifying potential opportunities for business development, proposing new services and team development to the Technology group management and firm’s management.

title: IT-архитектор
company: АО Страховая компания Халык, ДО Народного Банка Казахстана
description:
Обязанности:

Разработка структуры продукта, определение языков программирования, подбор методологии и инструментов реализации планов разработки ПО, подбор необходимых информационных технологий, написание техзадания, формулирование способов хранения и передачи данных.
Изучение, анализ и систематизация проектных документов.
Постановка задач всем членам команды.
Контроль на этапе тестирования создаваемого программного продукта.
Проработка внутренней структуры производимого IT-проекта.
Оценка написанного программного кода.
Поиск альтернативных решений текущих задач, возможностей и перспектив для дальнейшего развития проекта.
Оценка существующих рисков и потенциала появления ошибок в системе.

Требования:

Высшее техническое образование (информационные технологии, программная инженерия, кибербезопасность и др.).
Опыт работы в области IT от 3 - х лет, в архитектуре решений от 3 - х лет.
Опыт разработки и внедрения архитектурных стандартов и лучших практик.
Технические знания и навыки:

- Архитектурные подходы и паттерны.

- Глубокое понимание принципов проектирования и разработки ПО.

- Опыт проектирования архитектурных решений (монолит, микросервисы, event-driven, SOA, CQRS и др.).

- Владение архитектурными стандартами и фреймворками.

- Опыт построения высоконагруженных и отказоустойчивых систем.

- Знание принципов API-ориентированной архитектуры.

Технологии и инструменты:

- Опыт работы с облачными платформами и on-premise решениями.

- Владение DevOps-практиками, CI/CD и инструментами.

- Опыт работы с контейнеризацией и оркестрацией.

- Глубокие знания в области баз данных.

- Понимание принципов шифрования и других аспектов безопасности.

- Навыки работы с инструментами моделирования архитектуры.

Языки программирования: опыт работы с фреймворками Spring, .NET, Django, Express.js и др.
Возможность выезда в командировки (редко).

Мы предлагаем:

title: Power BI Consultant, Digital CFO group in Consulting
description:
We are seeking aPower BI Consultant to join our Digital CFO team. This role is ideal for someone with a strong background in business intelligence (BI) and data analytics who is eager to drive digital transformation and develop cutting-edge reporting tools for financial planning and analysis.

You will:

Participate in projects to develop and implement business intelligence and visualization tools using MS Power BI, Qlik Sense, and Apache Super Set.

Design and maintain BI dashboards, reports, and datasets to deliver actionable insights to business stakeholders.

Create and implement data models in Power BI to support reporting requirements and ensure data integrity.

Use Power Query and DAX to create and manage data connections and transformations, ensuring seamless data flow.

Work on optimizing the performance of Power BI reports and dashboards for scalability and efficiency.

Offer training and ongoing support to end-users, helping them leverage Power BI to its full potential.

Contribute to business transformation programs, from strategy development to operational implementation.

Assist in the design and implementation of finance operating models and processes, focusing on the digitalization of Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A).

You’re a great fit if you:

Have at least 1-2 years of experience in IT, data analysis, or BI, with a proven track record in developing interactive dashboards.

Possess hands-on experience with BI systems such as Power BI, Qlik Sense, or Apache Super Set.

Experience with EPM solutions like SAP BPC, Oracle Hyperion, Anaplan, or Board is an advantage.

Knowledge of financial modeling is a plus.

Strong understanding of ETL processes, data management, and data visualization.

Proficient in Python and SQL for data analysis and automation.

Advanced proficiency in MS Excel and PowerPoint.

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

Have Upper-Intermediate (B2) proficiency in both Russian and English with the ability to communicate effectively with stakeholders.

Diversity & Inclusion Statement

We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment regardless of their unique abilities, background, or identity.

title: Java/kotlin эксперт в трайб ТБ
description:
Halyk Банк – это мощная экосистема, где технологии сочетаются с ценностями.
Мы гордимся более чем 14 000 работниками, которые делают нас лучшим местом работы. Мы предоставляем услуги во всех сегментах финансового рынка: банковском, страховом, лизинговом и т.д.
Мы стремимся стать ведущим цифровым банком, внедряя инновации и предоставляя возможности для роста и развития.
Мы ищем талантливых специалистов, готовых развиваться вместе с нами!

Требования:
Образование: Высшее (предпочтительно в области информационных технологий, компьютерных наук или смежных дисциплин).
Опыт работы: 2-4 года разработки на Java/Kotlin.
Глубокое знание Java, включая многопоточность, коллекции
Уверенное владение Kotlin и опыт миграции проектов с Java на Kotlin.
Опыт работы с фреймворками: Spring (Spring Boot, Spring Data, Spring Security), Hibernate/JPA.
Знание микросервисной архитектуры и инструментов (Docker, Kubernetes, Kafka, REST/GraphQL).
Опыт работы с базами данных (SQL: PostgreSQL, Oracle; NoSQL: MongoDB, Redis).
Навыки тестирования (JUnit, Mockito, Testcontainers) и CI/CD (Jenkins, GitLab CI).
Понимание Agile-процессов (Scrum/Kanban), работа с Jira/Confluence.

Обязанности:
- Разработка и поддержка высоконагруженных приложений на Java/Kotlin в рамках Agile-спринтов.
- Код-ревью для младших разработчиков, обеспечение качества кода и соблюдения стандартов.
- Оптимизация производительности приложений, устранение узких мест (bottlenecks).
- Участие в планировании спринтов, груминге и обсуждении технических решений с Product Owner и командой.
- Наставничество и обучение менее опытных разработчиков
- Интеграция с внешними системами через API, обеспечение безопасности и масштабируемости решений.
- Анализ и проектирование решений, оценка задач

Условия:
•Заработная плата и бонусы: конкурентоспособная оплата труда благодаря системе грейдирования, премии ко Дню Независимости и годовой бонус.
•Социальный пакет: ДМС и страхование жизни, мобильная связь и скидки от партнеров.
•Отпуск и отдых: 26 дней отпуска с возможностью взять дополнительные дни при наступлении важных событий.
•Бонусы за рекомендации.
•Рабочие условия: льготные условия на паркинг, свободный стиль одежды (smart casual).
•Обучение и развитие: тренинги, вебинары и доступ к корпоративной библиотеке, четкая система карьерного роста.
•Корпоративная культура: открытая и дружеская рабочая атмосфера, спортивные турниры и активная корпоративная жизнь.
•Инициативы и проекты: возможность участия в социальных проектах, реализация идей в новых проектах группы «Halyk» с использованием современных digital-инструментов.
•Команда: творческая и поддерживающая команда для реализации ваших идей.
Присоединяйтесь к нам и становитесь частью команды «Halyk»!

title: Senior Specialist Digital Partner Commerce
description:
PURPOSE & OVERALL RELEVANCE FOR THE ORGANIZATION:

The vast majority of consumer journeys start online – they like to browse, research and compare products, even if they intend to buy in-store. The way consumers shop is reshaping the marketplace. As a result, many of our wholesale accounts (partners) are going through their own digital transformations. They are investing in how they reach the consumer online, whilst a new breed of accounts in the form of pure players and eMarketplaces have emerged in our digital ecosystem with new business models to service and sell to our consumers. At adidas, we are redefining our digital presence in a way that will push the future of digital and create premium experiences across all our consumer touchpoints to drive brand desirability, engagement and sales for our brands. The Digital Partner Commerce (DPC) team is driving this evolution in digital wholesale and through new business models across our worldwide organization.

As DPC Specialist you will be responsible to drive profitable and sustainable market share growth through Digital Partner Channels as well as developing programs that will drive key sales levers. You will work in an agile, fast-paced, global organization and in close collaboration with local DPC partners.

The purpose of this role is to accelerate digital sales growth with selected strategic partners in Emerging Markets Central (EMC) Export (Mainly but not exclusively to Central Asia, Caucasus, Ukraine, East Europe and other export countries). The DPC Specialist will provide the expertise and capabilities for “how to win” online by working with local Digital Partners and account teams to develop and implement initiatives and sales strategies to improve online performance of adidas products by e.g. improving visibility or conversion.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

To support the regional DPC Manager in all operational and admin related topics included but not limited to setting monthly forecasts, availability files, traffic light reports & Free To Sell lists, working closely with customer service & supply chain to ensure Delivery Notes are released and order book conversion is on time and in full
Work closely with Finance & Credit Control teams to ensure all account payments are on time and that the Partner’s Statement of Account is up to date
Responsible for all Pre line & Sell in preparations including full range recommendations, sell in tool updates, order collections post Sell in and OB analysis for Post Buy reviews
Support key accounts with pre-season, in season preparation and trading fulfilling with necessary master data, product arrivals phasing, and product information accuracy
To support DPC Manager in formulating trade investments (TI) and frequent tracking of performance against different TI buckets including Sales Working Budget utilization in accordance to the SWB TI framework requirements
Identify possible areas to improve sales of adidas products on our digital partner accounts’ websites, social channels and apps and develop initiatives to capture those opportunities; initiatives might include but are not limited to the areas of brand and product launch visibility, product findability, optimal ranging and conversion
Work closely with DPC Analytics – Performance Testing to define KPIs for successful proof-of-concept and measure uplift and provide additional business opportunities through Free to sell list sharing and order capturing

KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND ABILITIES:

University Degree subject or relevant to industry experience
1-3+ years of professional experience, with experience in E-Commerce field (e.g. Pure players, eMarketplaces, Digital merchandising, Digital consumer experience and/or Digital Marketing), Customer Service or Wholesale stream
Knowledge of local and global E-Commerce landscape
Proven sales experience ideally within the sport / retail sector
Strong industry knowledge, eCom, e-Marketplace, Pureplayers with strong cross functional experience across digital marketing and sales
Knowledge of product Master-data collection and processing
In depth understanding of local markets’ consumers, accounts, economic environment, and commercial needs
Strong Microsoft skills ie. Excel and Powerpoint
Innovative mindset, encouraging change, taking personal ownership and can-do attitude
Fluent English, both verbally and written

title: RRP Product Manager
description:
RRP Product Manager

The Product Manager (RRP) is entrusted with responsibility to oversee the development and execution of initiatives for RRP. This role requires strong analytical skills, cross-functional collaboration, and a results-driven mindset to ensure the success of RRP strategies, market performance, and trade support programs. The ideal candidate will have experience in volume planning, budget management, competitor analysis, and product promotion strategies.

Responsibilities:

Contribute to demand planning and volume calculations, aligning with stakeholders, ensuring readiness and efficiency
Manage and reconcile total RRP budgets, ensuring alignment with strategic goals.
Develop and optimize RRP support mechanisms and promotional programs.
Track in-market performance, monitor KPIs, and analyze sales, market share, and pricing trends.
Support trade programs, POSM development, and RTM strategy implementation.
Lead the preparation of BAP and Memos, working closely with stakeholders to initiate projects effectively
Prepare competitors' price and activations reporting, providing insights to support strategic decision-making
Establish and maintain effective working relationships with global functions, agencies, and internal stakeholders, fostering collaboration and alignment
Proactively engage with other functions within the market to drive the brand agenda forward, ensuring strategic alignment and collective success.

Requirements:

You have a University Degree (preferably in Business Administration, Engineering, Marketing, or a related field)
A minimum of 4 years of experience in the FMCG sector or marketing.
Advanced English level C1
The Kazakh language is a big plus
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) is required
Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to articulate complex ideas clearly and concisely
Meticulous attention to detail, with the ability to track project timelines, monitor progress, and identify and address issues proactively. Proficiency in analyzing data and making data-driven decisions
A collaborative mindset, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment and build strong working relationships with internal and external stakeholders
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and adapt to changing priorities and requirements with resilience and composure
Strategic mindset with the ability to think critically, anticipate challenges, and develop innovative solutions to drive business growth and competitive advantage.

Benefits:

Flexible working hours
Transportation
Competitive salary
Access to company’s trainings and seminars
Comprehensive health insurance
Life & Disability insurance
Well-being programs for employees.

title: Senior Product designer
description:
Halyk Банк – это мощная экосистема, где технологии сочетаются с ценностями.
Мы гордимся более чем 14 000 работниками, которые делают нас лучшим местом работы. Мы предоставляем услуги во всех сегментах финансового рынка: банковском, страховом, лизинговом и т.д.
Мы стремимся стать ведущим цифровым банком, внедряя инновации и предоставляя возможности для роста и развития.
Мы ищем талантливых специалистов, готовых развиваться вместе с нами!

Требования:
• Не менее 2-х лет опыта работы дизайнером UX/UI.
• Наличие в портфолио нескольких разработанных интерфейсов приложений в таких областях как веб-дизайн, разработка приложений для мобильных устройств, планшетов.
• Отличные навыки прототипирования, способность в короткие сроки предлагать "рабочие" дизайн решения.
• Свободное владение инструментами прототипирования и дизайна Figma, Adobe Photoshop и др.
• Знание и регулярное отслеживание передовой практики в CX, UX, и Service Design.

Обязанности:
• Проектировать пользовательские интерфейсы используя data-informed и data-driven подходы.
• Проектировать CJM, Карты эмпатии.
• Принимать ключевые решения по выбору подхода к дизайну продукта.
• Преобразовывать продуктовые идеи в макеты и прототипы, интуитивно понятные пользователю.

Условия:
•Заработная плата и бонусы: конкурентоспособная оплата труда благодаря системе грейдирования, премии ко Дню Независимости и годовой бонус.
•Социальный пакет: ДМС и страхование жизни, мобильная связь и скидки от партнеров.
•Отпуск и отдых: 26 дней отпуска с возможностью взять дополнительные дни при наступлении важных событий.
•Бонусы за рекомендации.
•Рабочие условия: льготные условия на паркинг, свободный стиль одежды (smart casual).
•Обучение и развитие: тренинги, вебинары и доступ к корпоративной библиотеке, четкая система карьерного роста.
•Корпоративная культура: открытая и дружеская рабочая атмосфера, спортивные турниры и активная корпоративная жизнь.
•Инициативы и проекты: возможность участия в социальных проектах, реализация идей в новых проектах группы «Halyk» с использованием современных digital-инструментов.
•Команда: творческая и поддерживающая команда для реализации ваших идей.
Присоединяйтесь к нам и становитесь частью команды «Halyk»!

title: Site Engineer, Junior
description:
Huawei Technologies is a leading ICT organization committed to delivering innovative solutions and top-notch service. We are currently seeking an enthusiastic and motivated individual to join our team as a Site Engineer. This is an excellent opportunity for someone looking to start a career in project management and control, with ample opportunities for growth and development.

Key Responsibilities:

Assist in overseeing daily site operations to ensure project plans are executed effectively.
Monitor site activities to ensure work is carried out according to specifications, plans, and safety standards.
Support the coordination of materials, equipment, and labor to maintain project timelines.
Conduct site inspections to assess progress, quality, and adherence to project requirements.
Collaborate with site managers, subcontractors, and other stakeholders to address any issues or challenges.
Prepare and maintain accurate site reports, logs, and documentation.
Participate in project meetings and contribute to planning and decision-making processes.

The site engineer is the owner of the site and monitors the whole cycle of the site implementation.

Manage site access, identify problematic sites in advance, and follow up customer's leasing department to resolve the problems.

Visit site to manage subcontractor teams and monitor construction progress.

Monitor subcon construction process to make sure quality and EHS standard followed.

Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or a related field.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent organizational abilities and attention to detail.
Effective communication skills, both written and verbal.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
Willingness to work on-site and adapt to a dynamic work environment.

Preferred Qualifications (but not required):

Basic knowledge of construction processes and site management.
Familiarity with AutoCAD or other design and project management software.
Understanding of safety regulations and standards.

What We Offer:

Comprehensive training and mentorship program.
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Opportunities for career growth and advancement.
A collaborative and supportive work environment.

title: System Analyst
description:
The IT-company Andersen invites an experienced System Analyst in Almaty to work on a project for one of our Kazakhstan customers.

The customer is one of the leading commercial banks in Kazakhstan. The bank's main areas of activity are corporate and retail banking. It also actively participates in the securities market and currency operations in Kazakhstan. The customer has its network of branches and offices throughout the Republic, serving more than 100,000 legal entities and 1.5 million individuals.

The project is a new level of banking for legal entities built on microservice architecture. The goal is to attract new clients and develop a new mobile application for clients with subsequent migration of users.

Responsibilities:

Gathering requirements, conducting analysis and research on assigned tasks.
Assisting the team in requirements generation.
Developing and decomposing functional requirements.
Identifying and describing non-functional requirements.
Developing testing scenarios and acceptance criteria.
Conducting interviews with business owners.
Writing technical tasks/user stories/use cases for developers, technical specifications.
Working with development teams using Scrum methodology.
Creating reports.
Monitoring the implementation of new product events and metrics.
Working with product managers, business analysts, designers and the development team.

Requirements:

Experience as a System Analyst for 3+ years.
Knowledge of requirements elicitation techniques (Jira, Confluence, User Story, Test Case).
Understanding of software lifecycle stages and processes.
Advanced skills in writing technical specifications.
Experience in full-cycle digital product development.
Knowledge of product development methodologies.
Understanding of integration principles (HTTP, REST, SOAP).
Experience with XML, JSON, UML, BPMN.
Basic skills in working with DBMS (Oracle, Postgres).
Ability to work with Postman, Swagger.
Understanding of the principles and methods of IS construction.
Structured and analytical thinking.
Competent oral and written speech, excellent communication skills.
Level of English – from Intermediate and above.

Reasons why this job would be interesting to you:

Experience in teamwork with leaders in FinTech, Healthcare, Retail, Telecom, and others. Andersen cooperates with such businesses as Samsung, Siemens, Johnson & Johnson, BNP Paribas, Ryanair, Mercedes, TUI, Verivox, Allianz, T-Systems, etc..
We have been strengthening our expertise since 2007. During this time, we have formed an excellent BA & SA team with streamlined processes, which now consists of more than 200 qualified analysts.
Job conditions – you can work both fully remotely and from the office or can choose a hybrid variant.
The opportunity to earn an additional up to 1,700 EUR per month by participating in the company's activities.
We give our employees an opportunity to attend and participate in the company’s BA meetups, as well as offer a compensation program for international professional certificates.
There are many different ways to grow and develop at our company. You can improve as a tech specialist or a resource manager, and all your activities will be decently rewarded.
You will have an opportunity to take on the role of a mentor and help a group of BA/SA beginners grow.
Our employees have access to Andersen Knowledge Base, where they can take courses in a variety of areas: the art of negotiation, PreSale & Discovery, Agile essentials, product ownership, microservice architecture, API design, SQL, AWS, GDPR, UX/UI, people management, and more.
Bright corporate life (parties / pizza days / PlayStation / fruits / coffee / snacks / movies).
Referral program.
English courses.
Private health insurance and compensation for sports activities.

Your personal data is protected in accordance with GDPR regulations.

Join us!

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
Account Manager (B2B)
description:
Tothemoon is a leading cryptocurrency exchange dedicated to providing innovative and secure trading solutions for businesses. We are seeking a motivated and experienced Account Manager (B2B) to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be the primary point of contact for our business clients, ensuring their needs are met and their experience with Tothemoon is exceptional. You will also play a crucial role in supporting our Partnership Manager in identifying and engaging new B2B clients to expand our network and enhance our service offerings.

Responsibilities:

• Act as the main point of contact for assigned B2B clients, addressing inquiries and resolving issues related to their accounts and trading activities.

• Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, understanding their business needs and objectives to provide tailored support.

• Collaborate with the Partnership Manager to identify potential new B2B clients, conducting market research and outreach to generate leads.

• Assist clients in navigating the Tothemoon platform, providing training and guidance on features and functionalities.

• Monitor client account activity and performance, proactively identifying opportunities for upselling and cross-selling additional services.

• Prepare and deliver regular reports on client engagement, satisfaction, and account performance metrics.

• Stay updated on industry trends, market developments, and competitor activities to provide informed recommendations to clients.

• Collaborate with internal teams, including compliance, technical support, and marketing, to ensure seamless service delivery.

• Participate in industry events and networking opportunities to promote Tothemoon and establish new business relationships.

Requirements:

• Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, Marketing, or a related field.

• Proven experience as an Account Manager or similar role in a B2B environment, preferably within the fintech or cryptocurrency industry.

• Strong understanding of cryptocurrency markets, trading platforms, and blockchain technology.

• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport with clients and stakeholders.

• Demonstrated problem-solving skills and a proactive approach to client management.

• Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and generate actionable insights.

• Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively within a team-oriented environment.

• Proficiency in CRM software and Microsoft Office Suite; experience with data analysis tools is a plus.

• Passion for the cryptocurrency industry and a desire to help businesses succeed in this rapidly evolving market.

If you are a driven professional looking to make an impact in the exciting world of cryptocurrency, we encourage you to apply for the Account Manager position at Tothemoon. Join us on our mission to revolutionize the way businesses engage with digital assets!
