title: Data Scientist
description:
Данная вакансия открыта для Freedom Holding Operations - дочерняя компания Freedom Holding Corp (далее - «Холдинг»).

Образование и опыт:

Высшее образование (бакалавр или выше) в области математики, статистики, компьютерных наук, инженерии или смежных дисциплин.

Обязанности:

Проведение анализа клиентской базы, построение моделей машинного обучения (ML), включая:
Сегментацию клиентов;
Прогнозирование склонности к покупке/оттоку;
Оценку жизненной ценности клиента (LTV).
Разработка и усовершенствование рекомендательных систем.
Проведение глубокого анализа данных и выявление ключевых инсайтов для поддержки принятия управленческих решений.
Взаимодействие с бизнес-заказчиками для формирования подходов к решению задач с использованием инструментов ML, включая полную разработку ML-сервисов (end-to-end).
Построение предиктивных моделей и внедрение их в производственные среды.
Мониторинг эффективности моделей, их дообучение и корректировка.

Технические навыки:

Отличное владение Python.
Опыт работы с библиотеками для анализа данных и машинного обучения:
NumPy, pandas, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch.
Уверенное владение SQL для извлечения и обработки данных.
Навыки работы с большими наборами данных.
Опыт построения и оценки моделей машинного обучения (регрессия, классификация, кластеризация).
Управление жизненным циклом моделей машинного обучения (автоматизация, оптимизация, переобучение и обновление).

Навыки работы с нейросетями:

Опыт работы с PyTorch.
Знание различных архитектур нейронных сетей (например, CNN, RNN, LSTM).
Владение методами предварительной обработки данных и инженерии признаков (feature engineering).
Опыт настройки гиперпараметров и оптимизации моделей.

Аналитические и профессиональные навыки:

Знание статистических методов и умение проверять гипотезы.
Умение доступно объяснять сложные технические концепции для различных аудиторий.
Способность эффективно работать в команде и взаимодействовать с коллегами.
Навыки управления проектами и постановки задач.

title: Менеджер по инфлюенс-маркетингу
description:
We are looking for a talented Influencer Marketing Manager to join our marketing team and lead creative, data-driven collaborations with social media influencers.

You will contribute to the growth and success of two dynamic projects in the beauty and wellness industry: ITS BEAUTY, a beauty salon chain in Dubai and Abu Dhabi, and BODIFY, a women’s fitness studio in Dubai.

As an Influencer Marketing Manager, you will be responsible for identifying, managing, and scaling partnerships with content creators, primarily on Instagram. Your goal will be to build authentic relationships that amplify our brand voice, drive brand awareness, and support acquisition and retention efforts.

You will collaborate closely with our marketing team to develop and execute influencer strategies aligned with brand objectives, audience insights, and campaign goals.


Key Responsibilities:

Research and identify relevant influencers through Instagram hashtags, geotags, and community accounts

Use tools and services to parse and structure influencer data (followers, engagement, content quality, etc.)

Initiate outreach and manage end-to-end communication with influencers

Negotiate collaboration terms and monitor deliverables

Track campaign performance and maintain structured reports

Stay up to date with industry trends and emerging creators in beauty, wellness, and fitness


Qualifications:

1+ years of experience in influencer marketing, social media, or digital PR

Strong communication and negotiation skills

Familiarity with Instagram and influencer analytics

Proficiency with Google Sheets / Excel

English level: B1 or higher (comfortable in both written and verbal communication)

Self-starter mindset, attention to detail, and ability to manage multiple tasks

Bonus: experience with parsing tools, and knowledge of the UAE influencer landscape


Why Join Us:

A workplace that inspires creativity and embraces innovation
Opportunities for growth in digital marketing and brand building
Remote work with flexible hours
Timely payouts — twice per month


Please note that this position is intended for women only, in line with our women-focused workplace culture.

title: Supplier Delivery Performance Specialist
description:
At Alstom, we understand transport networks and what moves people. From high-speed trains, metros, monorails, and trams, to turnkey systems, services, infrastructure, signalling and digital mobility, we offer our diverse customers the broadest portfolio in the industry. Every day, more than 80,000 colleagues lead the way to greener and smarter mobility worldwide, connecting cities as we reduce carbon and replace cars.

Could you be the full-time Supplier delivery performance specialist in EKZ, Astana we’re looking for?

Your future role

Take on a new challenge and apply your technical expertise in a new cutting-edge field. You’ll report to our SDP manager Dias Tulebayev at EKZ, and work alongside passionate teammates.

You'll conduct audits of our suppliers. Day-to-day, you’ll work closely with teams across the business (like Supply Chain, Procurement, Quality etc.), perform research and analytical tasks and much more.

You’ll specifically take care of assesing suppliers' production capacity, but also contribute to assessing and managing supply chain risks.

We’ll look to you for:

Drive Light Supply Chain Audit (LSCA) and Capacity Assessment (CA) when required
Drive Full Supply Chain Audit (FSCA) when required
Contribute to Supplier delivery risks assessments and follow up mitigation plan when involved
Animate Supplier Delivery Performance with Material Planning Team
Perform on targeted Suppliers root causes analysis to understand non-performance
If required, drive Capacity and/or Supply Chain Capability assessments
Implement and follow up recovery actions if any
Define and follow up action plan to improve Supplier Delivery performance
Ensure Action Plan report and update for Top Worst Suppliers

All about you

We value passion and attitude over experience. That’s why we don’t expect you to have every single skill. Instead, we’ve listed some that we think will help you succeed and grow in this role:

a degree in Business Administration, Engineering OR Supply Chain
experience performing audits
fluent English
strong analytical skills
understanding of overall Supply Chain processes, including industrial scheduling and transportation
excellent Excel skills (pivot, vlookup, power query etc.)
Business trips to suppliers' sites are required.

Things you’ll enjoy

Join us on a life-long transformative journey – the rail industry is here to stay, so you can grow and develop new skills and experiences throughout your career. You’ll also:

Enjoy stability, challenges and a long-term career free from boring daily routines
Work with new security standards for rail signalling
Collaborate with transverse teams and helpful colleagues
Contribute to innovative projects
Utilise our hard-working environment
Steer your career in whatever direction you choose across functions and countries
Benefit from our investment in your development, through award-winning learning
Benefit from a fair and dynamic reward package that recognises your performance and potential, plus comprehensive and competitive social coverage (life, medical, pension)

You don’t need to be a train enthusiast to thrive with us. We guarantee that when you step onto one of our trains with your friends or family, you’ll be proud. If you’re up for the challenge, we’d love to hear from you!

Important to note

As a global business, we’re an equal-opportunity employer that celebrates diversity across the 70+ countries we operate in. We’re committed to creating an inclusive workplace for everyone.
skills: Аудит,SAP,Excel,Работа с большим объемом информации,Оптимизация логистических процессов,Supply Chain Optimisation,Suppliers Assessment,Supply Chain Management,Английский — C2 — В совершенстве

title: DevOps engineer
Corporate Lawyer
description:
Since 2020, Almaty International Airport has become a part of the Turkish holding company TAV Airports.

TAV Airports provides comprehensive services in all areas of airport operations and is present in 108 airports in 29 countries. TAV Airports Holding, part of the ADP Group (France), is part of the leading global airport management platform.

Our vision is to be an innovative and leading airport operation company in our target regions: Europe, Russia & CIS, Middle East, Africa and India.

Our mission is to create maximum value for all airport stakeholders through our customer-centric management approach.

Responsibilities:

Legal support for the company’s activities within corporate relations.
Preparation and analysis of contracts, agreements, and other legal documents.
Assessment of legal risks and providing advice on corporate law matters.
Support for mergers, acquisitions, and business restructuring processes.
Consulting on corporate governance and compliance with legal requirements.
Representing the company’s interests in government and judicial bodies.
Interaction with external consultants and regulatory authorities.

Requirements:

Higher legal education.
At least 3 years of experience in a corporate lawyer position.
Knowledge of corporate law, civil law, and basic principles of antitrust regulation.
Experience working with antitrust authorities and understanding the principles of antitrust legislation.
Ability to work with contract and legal documentation.
Excellent analytical skills and attention to detail.
Ability to multitask and strong communication skills.
Experience in an international company will be an advantage.
Knowledge of English is required on Upper-intermediate level

What do we propose to you?

Employment in accordance with the Labor Code of the Republic of Kazakhstan
Office location - Almaty International Airport (2/1, Maylin street)
Work schedule 5 days per week, working hours from 8.00 to 17.00 (lunch break from 12.00 to 13.00)
Annual paid leave of 24 calendar days (+1 day for birthday)
Annual bonuses on performance results
Medical Insurance after Probation period
Shuttle bus
Corporate events, various membership offers & discounts
Trainings, e-Learning Academy, and other online/offline platforms
Trade Union benefits

title: Product Owner
description:
Компания Inova Tech приглашает талантливых специалистов присоединиться к команде профессионалов!

Мы – ведущий системный интегратор с многолетним опытом, занимающийся самыми передовыми проектами в сфере IT-инфраструктуры, системной интеграции, кибербезопасности и облачных решений. Мы ищем опытного Product Owner’а с функцией системного аналитика в команду, работающую над развитием цифровой платформы для обучения информационной безопасности. Это важный продукт в сфере кибербезопасности, и Вы будете играть ключевую роль в его формировании, развитии и масштабировании.

Что мы предлагаем:

Конкурентная заработная плата: Мы готовы предложить условия, соответствующие вашим ожиданиям и опыту. В Inova Tech ценят профессионалов
Развитие и карьерный рост: Реализуйте свои самые смелые идеи и проекты. Мы поддерживаем обучение и развитие, предоставляя возможности для постоянного совершенствования
Поддерживающий коллектив: Вы будете работать в дружелюбной и комфортной атмосфере, где каждый сотрудник ценен и уважаем.
Современный офис в центре города: Стильное и комфортное рабочее пространство создаст условия для продуктивной работы.

Ваши задачи:

Управление продуктовой разработкой: от идеи до релиза.

Сбор, анализ и описание требований (user stories, use cases, API-спецификации, acceptance-критерии).

Ведение бэклога, приоритизация задач, постановка целей.

Координация работы команды разработки, контроль сроков и качества выполнения задач.

Взаимодействие со стейкхолдерами, формализация бизнес-требований.

Участие в построении и оптимизации внутренних процессов команды.

Наш идеальный кандидат:

Опыт:

5+ лет в роли Product Owner / системного аналитика / тимлида.

Участие в полном цикле создания продуктов.

Опыт построения и развития команд (грейды, рост junior-специалистов).

Опыт коммерческой разработки ПО (желательно в средних и крупных IT-компаниях).

Технические знания:

Понимание архитектуры веб-продуктов (frontend, backend, devops-инфраструктура).

Навыки описания требований и спецификаций.

Знание CI/CD, devops-процессов, понимание принципов работы Kubernetes (желательно).

Языки:

Свободное владение казахским, русским и английским языками (внутри команды используется английский).

Мы ищем людей, которые стремятся к развитию, не боятся новых вызовов и готовы стать частью команды, создающей передовые решения. Готовы к этому? Откликайтесь на вакансию – будем рады знакомству!
skills: Управление продуктом,Системный анализ,Управление проектами,Agile Project Management,Scrum,Kanban,API,CI/CD,Figma,Atlassian Jira,Английский — C1 — Продвинутый

title: Brand manager KZ&CA
description:
Working with cross-functional, regional, and global teams, you implement a portfolio strategy that is aligned with the brand vision to drive sustainable growth. You support P&L management, future business development plans and objectives including new product development and opportunities.

HOW YOU WILL CONTRIBUTE:

Working with other internal stakeholders, you will support the brand portfolio strategy and priorities to enable consumer-centric brand portfolio growth. You will develop brand annual plans, setting objectives and allocating resources. In addition, you will offer recommendations for integrated commercial plans, develop, and execute marketing plans and pricings/de-pricings with finance that deliver on revenue and profit forecasts, and share objectives. Based on your deep consumer insights and brand positioning, you will develop and implement integrated marketing communications and 360-degree campaigns.

YOU ARE:

Positive and self-motivated - you are persistent, outgoing, independent, and proactive in your work
Both a creative and analytical thinker, adept at merging the two approaches to drive breakthrough results. Acumen with financial tools and P&L
An advocate for the power and value of Brand Marketing - confident in communicating to the wider business the impact of Brand Marketing within a data-driven culture
An exceptional communicator, both in writing and verbally, with the ability to deliver clear and concise recommendations to senior leadership
Results-driven - you enjoy grinding away at issues and brainstorming creative methods for problem-solving
Interpersonal - you are intuitive, engaging, and outgoing; you are engaging and instantly connect with people

YOU HAVE:

Bachelor’s degree required (Marketing, Management or Finance). MSc/MBA preferred.
Minimum of four (4) years of experience in food FMCG/CPG BRAND MANAGEMENT (important!)
Marketing skills including ATL/BTL development, knowledge in media, research briefing & analysis, market analysis, consumer insights development, measurement & tracking of initiatives, product & packaging development, concept development
Strong strategic and analytical skills; know how to manage P&L
Experience utilizing Nielsen, GFK, and other research data reporting and analysis
Excellent communication skills to manage diverse relationship both locally & internationally
Ability to identify patterns and triggers in data and develop action plans in response
Proven experience in developing, executing, and delivering growth initiatives within the FMCG/CPG
Demonstrated leadership skills, including a track record of developing and driving initiatives that achieve objectives.
Strong interpersonal, communication and leadership skills
Strong bias for action
Ability to lead project team
Strong computer skills with Word, Excel and PowerPoint.

YOU’LL RECEIVE:

Competitive salary, annual bonus, health insurance, corporate mobile communication, lunch allowance, employee recognition scheme.

title: Senior specialist financial planning and analysis
description:
PURPOSE AND OVERALL RELEVANCE TO ORGANIZATION:

The FP&A Senior Specialist plays a key role in supporting the financial planning and analysis (FP&A) functions within Emerging Marketing. This individual will work closely with the FP&A Manager and other teams to provide insightful financial analysis, reporting, and budgeting. The position requires a proactive approach to identifying opportunities for operational efficiency and profitability improvements, while ensuring alignment with Adidas’s overall financial goals and strategic objectives.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

1. Financial Planning and Forecasting:

Assist in the preparation and consolidation of annual budgets, forecasts, and financial plans.
Prepare monthly financial forecasts in collaboration with the business teams, providing detailed analysis of performance vs. budget and prior periods.
Support the development of long-term financial models and strategic initiatives.

2. Financial Reporting and Analysis:

Perform financial analysis to identify trends, variances, and potential areas for improvement in revenue, costs, and profitability.
Prepare regular management reports and presentations, including KPI tracking, variance analysis, and business performance reviews.
Evaluate financial performance and provide actionable insights to support decision-making.

3. Ad-Hoc Analysis & Business Support:

Provide ad-hoc financial analysis as required to support various business decisions.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams (e.g., Sales, Marketing, Operations) to ensure financial targets are aligned with business objectives.

KEY REQUIREMENTS:

Bachelor’s degree in finance, Accounting, Business Administration, or a related field.
Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in FP&A or financial analysis roles, preferably in a multinational or retail environment.
Strong knowledge of financial modeling, budgeting, forecasting, and reporting.
Previous experience working in an international company is a plus.
Strong proficiency in Microsoft Excel and financial modeling.
Experience with financial reporting systems (e.g., SAP, PowerBI).
Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret financial data and provide insights.
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to interact with senior management and cross-functional teams.
Strong attention to detail, with the ability to prioritize tasks and manage multiple deadlines.
Proactive, self-driven, and comfortable in a fast-paced environment.
Fluency in English (written and spoken) is required.

description:
Обязанности:
Сбор/анализ/документирование бизнес-процессов и формирование бизнес и системных требований для разработки новых и доработки существующих информационных систем.
Разработка сценариев (BRD, SRS, Use cases, Yser stories use cases) и диаграмм бизнес-процессов (BPMN, UML).
Разработка и поддержка технической документации (ТЗ, API-спецификации (Swagger, OpenAPI), диаграммы процессов).

title: Business development manager
description:
Мы - команда, занимающаяся разработкой передовой системы видеоаналитики на основе искусственного интеллекта. Наш продукт способен эффективно обрабатывать огромные объемы данных с сотен тысяч камер, обеспечивая миллионы событий в реальном времени. Мы стремимся к постоянному совершенствованию нашей технологии, чтобы предоставлять нашим клиентам лучшие инструменты для обработки и анализа видеоданных.

Ищем Business Development Manager, чтобы вместе реализовывать амбициозные проекты, укреплять и расширять наши партнерские и клиентские отношения, а также способствовать дальнейшему успеху нашего инновационного продукта.

Чем предстоит заниматься:
- Ведение клиентского сопровождения от старта проекта до его завершения, включая подготовку презентаций, разработку бизнес-требований (BRD), координацию работы с заказчиком для определения его потребностей (custdev), подготовку предложений, заключение контрактов.
- Координация взаимодействия между заказчиком и командами продаж и инженеров.
- Подготовка презентаций (в сотрудничестве с дизайнером) и расчетов по проектам.
- Предупреждение и разрешение конфликтных ситуаций.
- Заключение дополнительных сделок и допродажа дополнительных услуг.
- Привлечение новых клиентов и сотрудничество с партнерами компании.
- Ведение отчетности и документации по клиентам.
- Участие в переговорах и разрешение спорных ситуаций.
- Подготовка документации для участия в государственных закупках (по необходимости).

Что мы ждем от кандидата:
- Опыт со сложными или комплексными проектами (IT или телеком)
- Высокие коммуникативные навыки.
- Опыт работы с воронкой продаж и управлением лидами.
- Умение быстро вовлекаться в процессы и быть самостоятельным
- Знание казахского языка - обязательно
- Знание английского языка не ниже уровня B2 будет дополнительным преимуществом.

Мы предлагаем:
- Расширенное медицинское страхование
- Компенсация курсов повышения квалификации
- Компенсация занятий спортом

description:

title: Medical Lead Rare Diseases
company: “Novartis Pharma Services AG”, филиал в Республике Казахстан
description:
Branch office of the Swiss pharmaceutical company Novartis Pharma Services in Kazakhstan announces recruitment for the position “Medical Lead Rare Diseases, Emerging Markets”.

Position summary:

This role is responsible for developing the medical strategy and plans for the Rare Disease portfolio (Zolgensma, Ilaris, Luxturna) in the Emerging Markets cluster and ensuring excellent implementation. In addition to building strong relationships with KOLs there is also likely to be involvement with other stakeholders, including patient groups, to support education on disease and understanding of products. The role requires an individual who is passionate about rare diseases and their treatment, and who brings a broad skill set with a can-do attitude to all aspects of their work.

Main job objectives:

Medical leadership and management of the rare disease portfolio. Provides key medical expertise on the disease areas and products across Emerging Markets.

Lead scientific and medical engagement with relevant healthcare professionals and organizations

Development, implementation and execution of product-specific medical plans, and annual medical planning process.

Increase the awareness of rare disease brands, programs, and disease areas through scientific presentations, projects, and educational training.

Act as ambassador in external scientific programs and congresses.

Work in collaboration with other functions in Emerging Market including countries Market Access, Patient Advocacy, Public Affairs and commercial to ensure effective patient access and outcomes.

Engage with key scientific leaders and other partners in the wider healthcare systems including Patient Associations to co-design strategies, studies, and projects.

Gather and internally shares relevant captured insights (advisory boards, preceptorship mtgs, standalones, international co-events, etc.), to shape current and future activities.

Act as lead in governance of external funding, advisory boards, HCP/ HCS engagements and patient support programs.

Manage budget planning and has execution responsibility for the assigned medical budget

Collaborate with ECC Medical Lead and wider cluster team to support joint strategies, processes, projects. Shares best practice with peers in GTx region/country organizations.

Ensure compliant medical release of marketing and other relevant materials. Comply with all Novartis standards of behavior and ethics.

Requirements:

Degree in medicine
Minimum of 5 years experience in Medical Affairs roles in international pharmaceutical companies, preferably in multiple therapeutic areas positions. Exposure to orphan drugs is a plus.
Scientific credibility and demonstrated ability to influence members of the medical/scientific community
Demonstrable ability as a self-starter and to work in a cross-functional environment
Direct experience of working with PAGs is highly valued
Exceptional interpersonal and organizational skills and attention to detail, with ability to identify shared goals and achieve consensus among individuals and stakeholders.
Strong presentation and written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to develop, track, and execute annual and project-specific plans and budgets.
Fluent in Russian and with strong English language skills, additional languages a plus
Prepared to travel when required.

Compensation & benefits package:

Competitive salary based on market benchmark, medical insurance, car and set fuel / meal / phone limits, annual bonus based on the company incentive policy; professional development opportunities within Novartis group of companies.

Why Novartis?

We help few millions of patients each year. And while we’re proud of that fact, in this world of digital and technological transformation, we must also ask ourselves this: how can we continue to improve and extend even more people’s lives.

We believe the answers are found when curious, courageous and collaborative people like you are brought together in an inspiring environment. Where you’re given opportunities to explore the power of digital and data. Where you’re empowered to risk failure by taking smart risks. And where you’re surrounded by people who share your determination to tackle the world’s toughest medical challenges.

We are Novartis. Join us and help us reimagine medicine.

title: Product Owner (Data Office)

title: Material Scheduler
description:
At Alstom, we understand transport networks and what moves people. From high-speed trains, metros, monorails, and trams, to turnkey systems, services, infrastructure, signalling and digital mobility, we offer our diverse customers the broadest portfolio in the industry.

Every day, more than 80 000 colleagues lead the way to greener and smarter mobility worldwide, connecting cities as we reduce carbon and replace cars.

Could you be the full-time Material Scheduler in Astana we’re looking for?

Your future role

Take on a new challenge and apply your analytical expertise in a new cutting-edge field. You’ll report to Lead Material Scheduler Aida Ishanngaliyeva, and work alongside passionate and inquisitive teammates.

You'll guarantee precise forecast of material needs for production. Day-to-day, you’ll work closely with teams across the business (Operations, Procurement, Engineering etc.), contribute to budget optimization and much more.

You’ll specifically take care of calculating min/max for materials within scope, but also monitoring actual versus plan.

We’ll look to you for:

Manage the Materials Requirements Planning process to ensure materials are available for Operational requirements whilst meeting inventory budgets;
To maintain & update MRP parameters in the business system, as well as the creation of new parts and management of obsolete material.
To support the business through the provision of additional data in the form of reports and Key Performance indicators (KPI’s) as specified by the Supply Chain;
To maintain all Material Master records.

All about you

We value passion and attitude over experience. That’s why we don’t expect you to have every single skill. Instead, we’ve listed some that we think will help you succeed and grow in this role:

Analytical skills
Experience with an ERP system (SAP, JDE, 1C, Axapta or other)
Intermediate English
Expert MS Excel proficiency
Power BI and Power Query proficiency is desired
Good communication and data management skills

Things you’ll enjoy

Join us on a life-long transformative journey – the rail industry is here to stay, so you can grow and develop new skills and experiences throughout your career. You’ll also:

Enjoy stability, challenges and a long-term career free from boring daily routines
Work with cutting-edge analytical tools
Collaborate with transverse teams and helpful colleagues
Contribute to innovative projects
Utilise our agile working environment
Steer your career in whatever direction you choose across functions and countries
Benefit from our investment in your development, through award-winning learning
Benefit from a fair and dynamic reward package that recognises your performance and potential, plus comprehensive and competitive social coverage (life, medical, pension).

You don’t need to be a train enthusiast to thrive with us. We guarantee that when you step onto one of our trains with your friends or family, you’ll be proud. If you’re up for the challenge, we’d love to hear from you!

Important to note

As a global business, we’re an equal-opportunity employer that celebrates diversity across the 63 countries we operate in. We’re committed to creating an inclusive workplace for everyone.

title: Senior Java Developer департамента развития информационных систем ЮЛ
description:
Требования:
- Java – уверенное владение Spring Boot, Spring Data, Hibernate (требуется опыт 5+ лет)
- BPM-платформа – опыт работы с Camunda (v7.10)
- База данных – PostgreSQL (v9.6 и выше)
- Операционные системы – Ubuntu, CentOS
- CI/CD-инструменты – Docker, Kubernetes
- Back-end разработка – Spring Boot Starter (v1.5.9 Release и выше)
- Системы контроля версий – Git

Основные задачи:

title: FullStack Developer (Java/React)
description:
The IT company Andersen invites an experienced FullStack Developer (Java/React) to join its team for working with a company from Cyprus .

The position requires business trips to Cyprus.

The customer is one of the largest telecommunication providers. It provides integrated mobile and fixed telephony, internet and pay-TV services as well as specialized ICT solutions for businesses. At the same time, the company also has its own network of sales points, operating stores with technology products, accessories and telecommunication solutions.

The project focuses on enhancing a custom internal CRM system to streamline customer relationship management and improve service quality.

Technological stack on the project: Java & React JavaScript library, Spring Framework & on Spring Cloud|, Maria DB &, MongoDB, Kubernetes, Docker, Microservices architecture & REST APIs, Maven, Git (gitlab & gitlab-ci).

Responsibilities:

Gathering and analyzing of business requirements.
Creating, customizing and integrating software applications.
Troubleshooting and supporting software systems.
Setupping, monitoring and administrating software systems.
Enhancing existing CRM systems performance and KPIs.

Must-haves:

University degree in Computer Science, Information systems or any other relevant field.
Experience of hands on programming for 1+ year.
Strong knowledge of Java & React JavaScript library.
Strong knowledge on Spring Framework & on Spring Cloud.
Experience in manipulating data from databases (Maria DB & MongoDB).
Experience in Kubernetes.
Experience with containers (Docker).
Experience in Agile methodology (Scrum / Kanban).
Experienced in JIRA.
Experienced in Microservices architecture & REST APIs.
Knowledge in Maven.
Knowledge of Git (gitlab & gitlab-ci).
Level of English – from Intermediate+ and above.

Nice-to-haves:

Experience in Continuous Delivery.
Experience in Quarkus Framework.
Knowledge in OAuth, OIDC & Keycloak.

Reasons why this job would be interesting to you:

Guarantee of professional, financial, and career growth! The company has introduced systems of mentoring and adaptation for each new employee.

title: Head of Electronic Systems
description:
Since 2021, Almaty International Airport has become a part of the Turkish holding company TAV Airports.

TAV Airports provides comprehensive services in all areas of airport operations and is present in 15 airports. TAV Airports Holding, part of the ADP Group (France), is part of the leading global airport management platform.

Our vision is to be an innovative and leading airport operation company in our target regions: Europe, Russia & CIS, Middle East, Africa and India.

Our mission is to create maximum value for all airport stakeholders through our customer-centric management approach.

Responsibilities:

Provide electronic engineering support, including design, optimization, start-up, and troubleshooting of Fire Alarm, Public Announcement, SACS, CCTV systems, and other related systems.
Work closely with the Operations and Maintenance teams to identify the need for repairs and support planning of electronic equipment repairs.
Identify opportunities to enhance the reliability and performance of electronic systems.
Develop and provide support for operating and maintenance procedures for electronic systems.
Participate in incident investigations for operating assets to determine causes and corrective actions.
Provide technical oversight during construction activities, ensuring electronic systems are installed according to design specifications.
Supervise and guide a team of electronic system technicians, ensuring technical proficiency and high service quality.
Facilitate goal-setting and perform annual performance reviews for technicians to foster their professional development.
Oversee small to medium renovation projects, ensuring they are completed on time, within scope, and on budget.
Ensure all construction activities comply with relevant safety codes and regulations.
Manage subcontractors to ensure budget control and quality standards are maintained.

Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree in Electronic Engineering or a related field.
7 – 10 years of experience in electrical engineering, with a strong background in electronics systems.
Proficiency in AutoCAD, SAP, and MS Office.
Knowledge of building processes, construction principles, and relevant building codes.
Familiarity with industry regulations and safety standards.
Strong verbal and written communication skills in Kazakh, English and Russian.
Excellent troubleshooting, problem-solving, and analytical skills.

Conditions

employment in accordance with the Labor Code of the Republic of Kazakhstan
office location - Almaty International Airport (2, Mailin street)
annual paid leave of 24 calendar days up to 28 days based on years of service
working schedule 5/2
shuttle buses with 13 routes
e-Learning Academy, LinkedIn learning
annual bonus based on your performance
medical insurance

title: Data Software Engineering Trainee
description:
Details

If you have strong Python programming skills and want to start a career in Data Software Engineering (prev. Big Data), then this program is what you need.

Our learning path includes two stages, offering you a step-by-step approach to gaining in-depth knowledge in this direction. By participating, you will have the opportunity to:

Gain expertise in software development technologies and Git
Dive into the capabilities of the leading public cloud platforms
Explore the design, development and maintenance of large data-volume software systems
Learn large-scale data handling technologies (Hadoop, Apache Spark, Kafka, etc.)

Training process

The program consists of two stages:

In the first stage, you will explore self-study materials at your convenience and complete assigned tasks with immediate automated feedback. Completing this stage usually takes ~3 months with ~10-12 hours of weekly engagement.
If you show good results and successfully pass a technical interview, we will invite you to the next stage. It usually lasts ~3 months and requires ~20 hours of weekly engagement. We will offer you a mentoring program with one-to-one meetings with production experts.

Upon program completion, you may be able to continue your career path according to demonstrated skills and available opportunities at EPAM.

What is required for training:

English speaking level from B2 (Upper-Intermediate) and higher
Strong Python programming skills
Practical experience in one of the additional languages (Java or Scala)
Solid knowledge of the Relational Database Management System (DBMS) theory
Good command of Structured Query Language (DML/DDL/DCL/TCL)
Theoretical knowledge of DWH/Data Lake and one of the visualization tools
Basic understanding of Linux, Docker and Kubernetes

title: SAP FI Consultant
description:
LeverX is looking for an experienced SAP FI Consultant.

We are dedicated to empowering our employees through innovative SAP projects and continuous professional development. As a close partner of SAP, we offer direct involvement in the latest SAP technologies, including S/4HANA, and support your growth with access to industry-leading training and resources.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

Functional SAP FI Consulting: Provide hands-on configuration for SAP FI modules, including General Ledger, Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, Assets Accounting, Period-Closing functionality, Treasury, and Cost Accounting (Cost Element, Cost Center, Internal Orders) and so on.
Project Involvement: Participate in full-cycle implementations, rollouts, migrations, support and enhancement projects while utilizing Agile/Activate methodologies.
Data Migration Expertise as a benefit: Work with SAP data migration strategies and tools like Migration Cockpit and Object Modeler to ensure seamless transitions.
Collaborate closely with clients to deliver tailored solutions and ensure successful project outcomes.

REQUIREMENTS:

Finance Process Expertise: Strong understanding of finance processes and proven experience as an SAP FI consultant.
System Implementation/Migration Experience: Expertise in system implementation projects, including S/4HANA and ERP.
Analytical Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to work creatively and analytically in fast-paced environments.
Agile/Activate Methodologies: Experience working within Agile/Activate frameworks to deliver efficient, high-quality solutions.
Data Migration: Experience in SAP data migration is a significant advantage, including knowledge of migration tools like Migration Cockpit.
SAP FI/CO Knowledge: Extensive experience in SAP FI/CO functionality, including all key financial functionalities.

WE OFFER:

Exciting SAP Projects: Work on full-cycle projects including SAP implementations, rollouts, and migrations for global leaders in various industries.
Professional Growth: Continuous development through structured career paths, access to the latest SAP training materials, Learning Hub, a corporate library, and resources to ensure you're always at the forefront of SAP advancements.
Stable Compensation: Enjoy competitive, 100% official pay, and long-term stability in a growing company.
Wide Development Opportunities: Gain exposure to innovative projects while deepening your knowledge of new SAP features.

Take the next step in your SAP FI career and join LeverX, where innovation meets professional growth. Be part of a global team shaping the future of financial solutions for industry leaders.

title: Специалист колл-центра
description:

title: Personnel Officer
description:
The IT company Andersen invites a Personnel Officer to join its successful and tight-knit team in Almaty.

Andersen is a European pre-IPO software development company uniting over 3,500 top-class professionals: developers, architects, testers, analysts, and other specialists.

Today, we are working with businesses from various parts of the world, including Western Europe, the USA, and Asia. Our expertise covers Banking, Finance, eCommerce, Healthcare, IoT, Business Intelligence, and other industries and areas.

If you are ready for a large amount of information and scope of tasks, know how to prioritize your work, are not afraid of new challenges, and dream of working at a large and constantly developing IT company, we will be glad to see you in our tight-knit team.

Responsibilities:

- Maintaining personnel records (100+ people): including hiring, relocation, dismissals, sick leaves, business trips, vacation schedules, vacation and leave balances, issuance of certificates, compensation, time sheets.

- Keeping and maintaining the established HR documentation.

- Familiarizing employees with documents.

- Consulting employees on personnel issues.

- Familiarizing employees with commercial secrets.

- Concluding apprenticeship contracts.

- Сommunicating with the personnel and accounting departments remotely, as well as with HR specialists and the recruiting department.

- Communicating with the personnel departments of other countries on arising issues.

- Mailing of postal correspondence.

Must-haves:

- University degree.

- Knowledge of the labor legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

- Experience as a Personnel Officer for 2+ years.

- Excellent knowledge of staff records management.

- Experience in registering remote employees.

- Experience in registering foreign citizens.

- Multitasking skills and high motivation.

- High level of independence and responsibility, communication skills, self-confidence, flexibility, initiative, and persistence.

- Level of Kazakh – Advanced or above.

- Level of English – Pre-Intermediate or above.

Nice-to-haves:

- Experience in AIFC (The Astana International Financial Center) and with EDI.

- Maintenance of temporary residence permit.

Reasons why this job would be interesting to you:

- Andersen cooperates with such businesses as Siemens, Johnson & Johnson, AstraZeneca, BNP Paribas, Allianz, Ryanair, TUI, Verivox, etc..

- For the past four years, our company has been growing annually by 60%-100%, and we constantly involve top-notch specialists in our team.

- We have been strengthening our expertise since 2007. During this time, we have formed excellent teams with streamlined processes, where you can learn something new from your colleagues every day and enjoy your work.

- Andersen’s employees work from anywhere in the world: at the company's offices or from home, and even combine both formats in the way that suits them best.

- We guarantee your professional, financial, and career growth. Mentoring and adaptation programs will help you blend with the team and get involved in your work as comfortably as possible.

- The most important thing that we value in our employees is a commitment to continuous learning. The company supports them in this and gives them access to the best educational platforms, seminars, and practices. In addition, for over 17 years, Andersen has assembled a huge knowledge base and established a robust resource management institution.

- Our employees are provided with a benefit package and an extensive set of bonuses.

- There are many different ways to grow and develop at our company. You can improve as a specialist or a manager, and all your activities will be decently rewarded.

Your personal data is protected in accordance with GDPR regulations. Learn more: https://andersenlab.com/privacy-policy

*Planned to be created and filled (prospective vacancy)

Join us!

title: Системный аналитик
description:
Обязанности:

Сбор, анализ и управление требованиями от стейкхолдеров, внутренних заказчиков и партнёров.

Урегулирование конфликтов между требованиями, оценка и минимизация рисков.

Анализ и оптимизация текущих бизнес-процессов, выявление точек роста и предложений по улучшениям.

Подготовка и поддержка проектной документации:

Схемы бизнес-процессов (As-Is / To-Be);

Модели предметной области;

Модели вариантов использования (Use Case);

Технические задания (ТЗ), SRS, спецификации API.

Моделирование бизнес-процессов (BPMN 2.0), построение глоссариев, диаграмм данных и других артефактов.

Участие в командных активностях: грумминги, планирования, декомпозиция задач, демонстрация результатов.

Участие в обучающих и внутренних мероприятиях: тренинги, тестирования, опросы.

Требования к Кандидату:

Опыт работы системным аналитиком от 2 лет.

Уверенные коммуникативные навыки: умение эффективно взаимодействовать с ИТ- и бизнес-командами, проведение встреч, протоколирование.

Опыт работы с:

Требованиями в рамках SDLC;

Моделированием процессов (BPMN 2.0, UML);

Технической документацией: ТЗ, SRS, API-спецификации (REST, SOAP).

Понимание архитектуры ПО, принципов интеграции, защиты данных и авторизации.

Будет плюсом:

Более 5 лет опыта в IT, в том числе как разработчик ПО.

Опыт работы в финансовом секторе или финтехе, знание нормативных требований (PCI DSS, НБРК, AML).

Владение инструментами: Jira, Confluence, Swagger, Camunda BPM, Gitlab, PlantUML.

Опыт работы с методологиями SAFe, AsyncAPI, архитектурой ESB.

Что мы предлагаем:

Регулярное корпоративное обучение — внутреннее и внешнее;

ДМС, материальная помощь, социальная поддержка, ежедневное медицинское сопровождение и др.;

Команда экспертов, которые любят своё дело и всегда готовы поддержать;

Современный офис и вся необходимая техника предоставляется.

title: Data Scientist (NLP)
description:
Привет! Мы ищем специалиста в области NLP, который поможет нам в быстром генерировании и тестировании гипотез для разработки инновационных продуктов. Эта роль предполагает работу в динамичной стартап-среде, где скорость и гибкость являются ключевыми.

Наш отдел занимается развитием и созданием сервисов и продуктов на основе Big Data и ML алгоритмов. Развивает R&D направление в области NLP, находит дополнительные источники монетизации данных. Откликайся ❤️

Что нужно будет делать:

Разработка и оптимизация NLP моделей под конкретные задачи.
Работа с командой для быстрого генерирования и тестирования гипотез.
Файн-тюнинг и адаптация open-source LLM-моделей.
Постоянное изучение статей и применение новейших достижений в области NLP.
Будет классно, если у вас есть:
Опыт в NLP и глубоком обучении.
Знание Python, PyTorch/TensorFlow, Git, Docker, SQL.
Навыки back-end разработки приветствуются.
Опыт работы с векторными базами данных и bert-based архитектурами.
Знание и опыт работы с языковыми моделями, такими как GPT, Mistral и другие.
Опыт разработки и оптимизации моделей для улучшения производительности (inference) будет плюсом.
Участие в конкурсах машинного обучения (Kaggle, хакатоны) будет считаться преимуществом.

В сопроводительном письме, пожалуйста, укажите свои зарплатные ожидания, спасибо! ❤️

Наши условия ниже :)

title: Data Scientist (NLP)
description:
Мы ИТ-компания, специализирующаяся на разработке решений iGaming и оптимизации бизнес-процессов. Наши продукты не только привлекают пользователей, но и помогают предприятиям более эффективно достигать своих целей.

Уверенные знания в области математики, статистики, необходимых для анализа данных и разработки моделей.

title: Senior Associate to Finance Planning & Analysis team
description:

Job Description & Summary:

As a Senior Associate you'll work as part of a team of problem solvers, helping to solve complex business issues from strategy to execution. Specific responsibilities include but are not limited to:

Participate in cross-functional internal and client teams to develop and deliver finance transformation projects covering budgeting, cost/separate cost accounting, management reporting policies and procedures
Play a role in advising clients on finance-related matters and designing solutions that can help address complex finance-related challenges, achieve sustainable results and demonstrate real impact
Foster relationships with client personnel at appropriate levels. Consistently deliver quality client services
Assist in the management and coaching of junior team members during projects and actively mentor Consultants in the FP&A team
Keep up to date with current regional and global economic and business trends, particularly maintaining a keen interest in Finance trends and the impact on our clients

Education Level:

Bachelor / master’s degree from a leading university (Finance, Mathematics, Statistics Economics, Accounting or IT degree)
Professional qualification (ACCA, SAP, 1C etc.) is an advantage
Professional certification related to ERP/EPM solutions is an advantage
Experience, knowledge, skills:
Strong focus on personal & professional growth and development
A good understanding of at least one of the following:

- Finance Technology Transformation

- Budgeting

- Finance modelling

- Cost/Separate cost accounting

Client-focused approach, with the ability to build strong relationships with diverse internal and external teams in demanding environments
Excellent organizational skills, having the ability to prioritise workload whilst being resilient and able to cope well under pressure and meet tight deadlines
Experienced user of the following programs Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint, MS Word
Passionate about innovation in Finance (BI, EPM, RPA, AI, etc.) as an advantage

Desired languages: Russian, English

title: Training manager
description:
Scope: Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan

Responsibilities

· Assume the role of main point of contact for any training related topic

· Design and develop comprehensive training materials, including presentations, manuals, e-learning modules, and other resources tailored to organizational needs.

· Customize training programs to address specific departmental or individual goals.

· Conduct engaging in-person and virtual training sessions for employees using interactive techniques to ensure active participation and maximize learning outcomes:

o Facilitate onboarding session for new hires

o Facilitate induction operational training for new hires based on SOP, local specificities and client requirements

o Facilitate continuous improvement training to support the development of employees based on identified training needs

o Mentor and coach employees to support their individual development plans

· Collaborate with managers and stakeholders to identify skill gaps and training needs and define an annual training calendar

· Conduct surveys, interviews, and performance evaluations to gather input for training programmes improvement

· Evaluate the effectiveness of training programs through feedback, tests, and performance metrics using a clear and documented process

· Produce reports on learning and development activities and progress reports of each employee to Supervisors, VAC manager, Training Community and HR Department

· Produce Induction training reports to support the management team and the HR department in providing feedback for probation reviews

· Continuously refine training content based on participant feedback and organizational goals

· Actively participate in the TLScontact Training Community

· Leverage learning management systems (LMS) and other digital tools to deliver and track training programs

· Stay updated with the latest training technologies and methodologies to enhance learning experiences

Other responsibilities:

· Support HR in conducting training needs assessments and other company’s surveys (GPTW, as an example) and analysing survey data with the future creating of an action plan.

· Assist HR in communicating and training employees on new or updated company policies, procedures, or systems.

· Work closely with HR and department heads to align training initiatives with overall business goals and workforce planning.

· Support HR-led events such as employee development programme, wellness programs and other initiatives for employee’s development.

· Support VAC manager with some tasks, where Trainer’s skills and experience can be used

· Act as agent, team leader and supervisor a minimum of 8 hours/month, to ensure continuous adequacy of operational knowledge.

Education:

Bachelor’s degree in education, Human Resources, Organizational Development, Social Sciences or a related field. A master’s degree is a plus.

Experience:

Proven experience as a Trainer, Corporate Instructor, or similar role

As a plus:

Experience in services within the scope of work in TLScontact (as agent or managerial role)

Familiarity with instructional design principles and adult learning methodologies

Language requirements:

Russian or Kazakh – native speaker (or C2)

English level – upper intermediate and above (speaking/reading/writing)

Other foreign language is a plus

Technical Skills:

Proficiency in MS Office

Robust knowledge of customer service techniques and principles

As a plus:

Experience with e-learning software (e.g., Articulate, Captivate, Canva, Easygenerator, Synthesia)

Experience with learning management systems (LMS)

Soft Skills:

Excellent presentation and communication skills.

Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to engage diverse audiences.

Adaptability, creativity, and problem-solving abilities.

Detail oriented, initiative, open mind

Values

Supportive of the Company Values of Integrity, Respect, Professionalism, Innovation and Commitment

title: Information Security Engineer
description:
AIX is currently seeking a highly motivated and experienced Information Security Engineer to join our dynamic IT team. This role will be crucial in maintaining and enhancing our security posture, with a strong emphasis on the practical application of security principles within our Microsoft Server 2019 environment and through our FortiGate firewall infrastructure. The ideal candidate will possess a deep understanding of security best practices, be adept at troubleshooting and resolving security-related issues, and have a proactive approach to identifying and mitigating potential threats.

Responsibilities

Security Administration of Microsoft Server 2019:
Implement and manage security policies and configurations on Windows Servers, including Active Directory, Group Policy Objects (GPOs), and server hardening.
Monitor and analyze server security logs to identify suspicious activity and potential security incidents.
Administer and maintain server-based security tools and technologies (e.g., antivirus, endpoint detection and response).
Ensure timely patching and vulnerability management of Windows Server infrastructure.
Implement and manage secure configurations for server roles and features.
FortiGate Firewall Management:
Configure, manage, and maintain FortiGate firewalls, including rule creation, VPN configuration (IPSec, SSL VPN), web filtering, application control, and intrusion prevention systems (IPS).
Monitor firewall logs and alerts to identify and respond to security threats.
Implement and enforce firewall policies to control network access and protect internal resources.
Troubleshoot connectivity and security issues related to the firewall.
Perform regular firewall rule reviews and optimizations.
Threat Detection and Incident Response:
Participate in the identification, investigation, and resolution of security incidents.
Analyze security alerts and indicators of compromise (IOCs).
Assist in the development and implementation of incident response plans.
Vulnerability Management:
Conduct regular vulnerability assessments and penetration testing (internal and external) in collaboration with third-party vendors or using internal tools.
Analyze vulnerability scan results and prioritize remediation efforts for Windows Servers and network devices (including FortiGate).
Track and report on the status of vulnerability remediation.
Security Policy and Procedure Development:
Contribute to the development, implementation, and maintenance of security policies, standards, and procedures.
Ensure adherence to security policies and regulatory compliance requirements.
Security Awareness and Training:
Assist in the development and delivery of security awareness training for employees.
Documentation and Reporting:
Maintain accurate and up-to-date documentation of security configurations, procedures, and incident responses.
Prepare regular security reports for management.
Collaboration:
Work closely with other IT teams (e.g., network, systems) to implement and maintain security controls.
Communicate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders regarding security matters.
Continuous Learning:
Stay up-to-date with the latest security threats, trends, and technologies, particularly related to Microsoft Server and FortiGate.

Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Cybersecurity, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).
Minimum of 2-3 years of experience in an Information Security role.
Demonstrable hands-on experience in administering and securing Microsoft Server 2019 environments, including:
Active Directory security principles and best practices.
Group Policy management for security hardening.
Windows Server security features and tools.
Patch management and vulnerability remediation on Windows Servers.
Proven practical experience in configuring, managing, and troubleshooting FortiGate firewalls, including:
Rulebase management and optimization.
VPN configuration (IPSec and SSL VPN).
Web filtering and application control.
Intrusion Prevention System (IPS).
High Availability (HA) configurations (if applicable).
Strong understanding of networking principles (TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, routing, switching).
Knowledge of common security threats and attack vectors.
Experience with vulnerability scanning tools and methodologies.
Familiarity with security frameworks and best practices (e.g., NIST, ISO 27001).
Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and troubleshooting skills.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills, good command in English.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Preferred Qualifications:
Relevant security certifications (e.g., CompTIA Security+, CISSP, CEH, Fortinet NSE certifications, Microsoft Certified: Azure Security Engineer Associate).
Experience with other security tools and technologies (e.g., SIEM, EDR, vulnerability management platforms).
Experience with network routing and switching concepts and security best practices.
Practical experience with Microsoft Defender for Endpoint (or other Microsoft Defender products), including configuration, monitoring, and threat response.
Scripting skills (e.g., PowerShell).
Experience with cloud security (e.g., Azure, AWS).
Knowledge of relevant data privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA).

title: Senior Planning and Cost Control specialist
description:
 Provide project controls (cost control, planning & reporting) services to project teams to ensure proper project planning and resource management
 Develops and ensures effective and successful Management Level (Levels 1 and 2) and Performance Level (Levels 3 and 4) project plans/schedules.
 Performs logic network planning using the Critical Path Method (CPM) for the development of all plans and schedules.
 Develops appropriate plans/schedules and monitors and updates plans/schedules for the project through Close-Out
 Ensures appropriate physical progress measurement for the project.
 Prepare resource and cost reports to reflect the agreed budget for the work and in line with the developed Work Breakdown Structure.
 Coordinates preparation of projects Progress Reporting and Management information packs.
 Identifies and addresses schedule risk
 Implementation and development when required of Project-Controls-related Processes and Procedures,
 To develop project schedules from summary to detailed level which optimize expenditure of time, resource utilization and cost.
 Prepare and update on a weekly basis a Progress Calculation Report. Undertake calculation of progress and productivity statistics.
 Develop and maintain a phased forecast profile based on Value of Work Done (VOWD) and use this to compare variances with actual VOWD and Control Budget
 Company ERP system maintaining with resource data, and analyse the trends
 Analysis, forecasting and manage the Company Projects resource and cost budgets as one entity. Compilation and analysis of historical planning, cost and resource data
 Develop, Verify & Approve forecast and actual booked hours, time sheets, and invoices. Undertake reconciliations between cost report and invoice figures.
 To identify areas of concern and subsequent recovery action to minimize adverse trends.
 Develop, implement and maintain the cost database system to monitor and track the overall project budget, forecast and actual costs
 Assist in preparing PVN’s and Change Orders as required. Review the changes in the weekly forecast and variance against the current approved budget in order to identify any trends or variations.
 Update the Planned, Committed, Expended and Estimated To Complete values.
 Undertake regular reviews of the schedules and progress reports to identify any trends, variations or concerns.
 Support all Project Service teams of planning, cost control, cost estimate and document controls when required
 Trains junior staff on their responsibilities, advises on best practices and ensures proper norms and methods are followed.
 Demonstrate a commitment to achieving of Company standards and procedures and development project and cost controls check lists and procedures
 To provide information to Senior Management to enable a project to be managed effectively.
 Undertake ad hoc reviews and analysis as directed by Project Service Management.

 Must have sound knowledge and understanding of technical terms and conditions.
 Familiar with all phases of Contracts, especially in FEED & Engineering phases.
 Must have knowledge and experience of Project Control, Cost Control, Planning and Reporting disciplines.
 Ability to identify changes and improvements to the technical documentation and procedures to reflect Client’s changing requirements.
 Knowledge of computer-based systems including, ERP systems, PRIMAVERA P6, Database Management systems, Excel, Power BI, Word, Microsoft Office or equivalent software packages.
 Knowledge of PMI and AACE practices and certification is preferred
 Be proactive, a self-starter and ability to work without supervision.
 Systematic thinker and good organizational skills/ time management.
 Strong personality with ability to be firm and persuasive without authority.
 Awareness of compliance and audit processes.
 Team player within and across functions.
 Sensitive to Client’s requirements and Client-focused

description:
KIMEP, School of Law is looking for applicants for the following position:

Job Title: Law School Marketing Officer

Division: Academic Affairs

Department: Law School

Position reports to: Dean of Law

Job Purpose Summary: The Law School Marketing Officer plays a crucial role in promoting the institution’s programs, enhancing its reputation, and attracting prospective students. This individual will develop and implement a comprehensive communications and marketing strategy, manage digital and print marketing campaigns, and engage with various stakeholders to effectively communicate the unique value proposition of our law school.

The job encompasses marketing, communications, media relations, social media strategy and administration, website and social media updates, oversight of print and digital materials, photo and video production, and outdoor and targeted ads campaigns.

Key Responsibilities and Duties:

Strategic Planning: Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies that target different audiences and align with the law school’s goals and objectives.
Content Creation: Produce compelling marketing materials, including brochures, newsletters, website content, and social media posts that resonate with target audiences.
Digital Marketing: Manage and optimize online marketing campaigns, including SEO, PPC, and social media advertising to enhance visibility and engagement.
Event Coordination: Plan and execute marketing initiatives for recruitment events, open houses, and other outreach programs to connect with prospective students and stakeholders.
Data Analysis: Monitor and analyze marketing metrics to assess the effectiveness of campaigns, providing insights for continuous improvement.
Stakeholder Engagement: Build and maintain relationships with faculty, alumni, current students, and industry professionals to promote the law school’s programs and successes.
Brand Management: Ensure consistency in branding and messaging across all marketing channels, safeguarding the law school’s image and reputation.
Research and Trends: Stay informed about legal education trends, competitor activities, and market demands to adapt strategies accordingly.
Perform other duties as might be directed by the supervisor.

Minimum Qualifications:

A bachelor’s degree or professional experience that support the job description.
Fluent English.
Strong writing, editing, and proofreading skills.
Effective oral and written communication. Strong organizational skills and attention to detail, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Ability to work collaboratively within a team environment and engage effectively with diverse stakeholders.
Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities.

Preferred Qualifications:

Fluency in Russian and/or Kazakh is an advantage.
Good relationships with local media outlets.

Why Join Us?

As a Law School Marketing Officer, you will have the opportunity to shape the future of legal education at KIMEP University. We are committed to fostering a dynamic work environment that encourages innovation and collaboration. Join us in our mission to empower the next generation of legal leaders!

Application Process:

Interested candidates should submit a resume, cover letter, and samples of previous marketing work.

Deadline for submission of applications/resumes is May 13, 2025 inclusive or open until filled.

Please indicate your salary expectations in KZT, net monthly.
