Обязанности:​​​​​​

Организация работы отдела тех.поддержки пользователей
Контроль и перенаправление обращений/заявок пользователей к соответствующим специалистам техподдержки для решения проблемы
Контроль ведение журнала с описанием выполненных действий и принятых решений с последующим занесением решений в единую базу
Оказание помощи и консультаций по сложным заявкам своим непосредственным сотрудникам при выполнении ими установки, настройки и обновлении программных продуктов и т.п.
Оказание помощи в решении технических сложных проблем при пользовании компьютерной, орг.техникой, офисных программ и информационных систем компании и дальнейшая координация работ
Предоставление технической информации по функциональности сервисов используемых в компании
Анализ проблем, которые были выявлены при использовании информационных сервисов компании, эксплуатации оборудования и разработка рекомендаций по их устранению
Контролировать время реагирования подчинённых на обращение пользователей, чтобы заявки отрабатывались в установленные сроки
Знание порядка и правил обработки обращений пользователей
Знание стандартных решений и ответов на наиболее часто задаваемые вопросы пользователей, написание инструкций для сотрудников компании
Уверенные знания технических характеристик персональных компьютеров, ноутбуков для проведения настройки, диагностики и мелко срочного ремонта
Требования:
Уверенное владение операционными системами Windows и Linux (включая серверные версии)
Уверенное знание ПК и офисных программ (возможности незначительный ремонт и неполадок, умение работы с антивирусными программами для удаления вирусов и устранения их последствий
Уверенные знания организации локальной сети, работы и настроек сетевого оборудования таких, как Wi-Fi роутер и USB модемы, Wi-Fi точки доступа
Умение и опыт организовать работу подчинённых по приему, обработке и регистрации заявок и обращений пользователей
Понимание принципов работы с запросами пользователей: систематизация, определение уровня важности и приоритета запроса;
Умение работать и разбираться с технической документацией
Доброжелательное общение и способность ясно излагать свои мысли
Знание английского языка на уровне чтения технической документации и перевод со словарём
Техническое мышление

Способность искать решения проблемы самостоятельно

Условия:

​​​​​​​Официальное трудоустройство по ТК РК

Курсы и тренинги за счет компании

Экстра day offs, помимо отпускных

Выездные тимбилдинги

Материальную помощь к отпуску, а также к памятным событиям

title: IT специалист (Data-Analyst,Security Engineer,Database Administrator)
description:
Привет!

О компании:

Rauzet — это современная сеть супермаркетов, которая активно развивается и внедряет цифровые технологии для обеспечения высокого уровня сервиса и безопасности. Мы стремимся быть на шаг впереди, создавая безопасную и эффективную среду работы с данными. Сейчас мы ищем талантливого Инженера по анализу и безопасности данных, который поможет нам обеспечить надежность и защиту наших систем.

Что вы будете делать:

Управление и анализ баз данных (реляционные и NoSQL).
Проектирование и оптимизация структуры баз данных.
Разработка и внедрение мер по обеспечению безопасности данных, включая шифрование и контроль доступа.
Мониторинг активности баз данных и выявление угроз безопасности.
Настройка резервного копирования и восстановление данных.
Проведение аудитов и устранение уязвимостей в системах хранения данных.
Анализ данных для выявления аномалий и предотвращения инцидентов, связанных с утечкой или компрометацией данных.
Мы ищем именно вас, если вы:
Имеете опыт работы с базами данных (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB или аналогами) от 3 лет.
Знаете стандарты и принципы информационной безопасности (GDPR, ISO 27001).
Умеете работать с инструментами анализа и мониторинга безопасности (Splunk, SIEM и др.).
Владите SQL и языками программирования для работы с данными (Python, R).
Имеете навыки проектирования схем баз данных и оптимизации запросов.
Работали с шифрованием данных и системами управления доступом.
Приветствуется опыт работы с большими данными (Big Data).
Условия:

Мы предлагаем:

Официальное трудоустройство и социальные гарантии.
ДМС и корпоративные бонусы.
Гибкий график работы с возможностью удаленного формата.
Работу в динамичной команде профессионалов.
Возможности для профессионального роста и сертификации.

Если вы хотите стать частью нашей команды и развивать безопасную работу с данными вместе с Rauzet, оставляйте свое резюме и сопроводительное письмо, где расскажите, почему именно вы подходите на эту позицию. Мы внимательно изучаем каждую заявку!

Присоединяйтесь к нашей команде! Давайте вместе делать лучшее!
skills: SQL Server Profiler,Python,Исследовательский анализ данных,Визуализация данных,Математическая статистика,Основы баз данных,Английский язык,Информационные технологии,Пользователь ПК,Big Data,Интерпретация данных,SQL,MS SQL,Настройка сетевых подключений,Работа с большим объемом информации,Техническая поддержка,Ответственность

title: Senior/Middle DevOps
description:
Bilim Media Group - это продуктовая EdTech-компания в Казахстане. Мы работаем с огромным масштабом изменений - со всей системой образования страны.

В нашей экосистеме сегодня более 20 цифровых продуктов и платформ. Сейчас в компании происходят качественные изменения, и мы ищем сотрудников способных предложить нестандартные решения и высокий уровень вовлеченности.

Мы ищем опытного и энергичного Senior/Middle DevOps для работы над образовательным проектом с высокой нагрузкой (2000 RPS). Наш проект находится на этапе технологической трансформации, и мы ищем специалиста, готового принять вызов по модернизации и оптимизации нашей инфраструктуры.

Наши задачи:

Внедрение DevOps практик и культуры в команде;

Автоматизация процессов с использованием современных инструментов;

Оптимизация производительности существующих PHP-приложений и баз данных MySQL, Postgres, Elastic, Redis;

Планирование и реализация перехода на более современные технологии;

Настройка мониторинга и обеспечение отказоустойчивости систем;

Улучшение безопасности инфраструктуры.

Мы от тебя ждем:

Опыт работы DevOps инженером от 3 лет;

Отличное знание контейнеров и Linux

Знание современных DevOps практик и инструментов;

Работа с мониторингом систем.

Понимание практик SRE

Опыт работы со следующими технологиями:

OpenStack

Kubernetes

Terraform

Ansible

Linux

Опыт работы с PHP-приложениями

Умение оптимизировать производительность систем с высокой нагрузкой

Навыки внедрения систем мониторинга и логирования

Что ты получаешь, присоединившись к нам:

Достойная зарплата — обсудим на встрече, индивидуально и честно.

Бонусы за результат — за достижение целей ты получаешь дополнительное вознаграждение.

Тёплая и поддерживающая команда — ценим уважение, открытость и чувство юмора.

Прокачка знаний — доступ к курсам Kitap.kz, Bilimland.com, Lerna.kz и другим образовательным платформам.

Языки — легко: изучай иностранные на Qlang.kz в удобном тебе ритме.

Уютный офис с зонами отдыха — кофе, чай, Xbox, настольный футбол и пространство для перезагрузки.

Кафетерий бенефитов — спорт, здоровье, обучение. Ты сам выбираешь, что важно (доступ через полгода).

Ивенты, квизы, meet-up’ы и Тәтті күн — традиция вкусных угощений и веселых встреч.

BYOD — если работаешь со своим ноутом, мы это компенсируем.

Как мы работаем:

В офисе в Астане (Expo, Мангилик ел 55/13) или Алматы (Нурлы-Тау, Аль-Фараби 17/1)

Возможен удаленный формат — обсудим на старте

График: пн–пт, с 9:00 до 18:00

Официальный найм с первого дня, испытательный срок — 3 месяца

title: Middle\Senior Business Analyst (Mentor BA)
company: ТОО Частная компания Solva Technology Ltd.

title: Менеджер по эксплуатации и техническому обслуживанию (O&M Manager) со знанием китайского языка
company: ФИЛИАЛ RICH ENERGY INTERNATIONAL (BEIJING)CORPORATION LIMITED В РЕСПУБЛИКЕ КАЗАХСТАН
description:
Китайский язык ОБЯЗАТЕЛЕН. Просим вас не откликаться на вакансию, если вы не владеете Китайским языком или если у вас нет опыта в данной сфере.

一、岗位职责（Job Responsibility）

落实公司生产运营管理体系及制度相关规定，并执行到位。

Implement the company's production and operation management system and relevant regulations, and ensure their execution.

根据实际，对生产运营、电力营销体系及制度的完善提出建设性意见和建议。

Provide constructive opinions and suggestions for improving the production operation, power marketing system, and regulations based on actual conditions.

落实项目整体生产运营、电力营销规划与目标，组织制定项目生产运营、电力营销工作规划、年度计划、项目电价管理及电力市场平衡管理。

Implement the overall production operation and power marketing planning and objectives of the project, organize the formulation of project production operation, power marketing work plans, annual plans, project electricity price management, and power market balance management.

负责运维体系建立、运行与优化。

Responsible for the establishment, operation, and optimization of the operation and maintenance system.

负责安全质量体系的建立，确保安全生产责任落实及安全生产投入到位，持续提升项目安全质量管理水平。

Responsible for the establishment of the safety and quality system, ensuring the implementation of safety production responsibilities and the allocation of safety production resources, and continuously improving the project's safety and quality management level.

组织制定项目各项工作计划并实施，开展发电计划管理工作，并跟进反馈。

Organize the formulation and implementation of various project work plans, carry out power generation plan management, and follow up with feedback.

组织开展生产运行管理工作，监督设备运行情况，编制生产运行情况分析报告。

Organize and carry out production operation management, monitor equipment operation status, and prepare production operation analysis reports.

负责风电场BOP团队和风机团队的管理，及时完成设备及维修管理工作。

Responsible for the management of the wind farm BOP team and turbine team, and timely completion of equipment and maintenance management.

负责组织开展电力（含绿电）市场、绿证和碳市场政策与市场环境研究。

Responsible for organizing research on the power (including green power) market, green certificates, carbon market policies, and market environment.

负责组织与各类市场主体、主管部门的公共关系维护与营销拓展：当地村民、电网、政府等。

Responsible for organizing the maintenance of public relations and marketing expansion with various market entities and regulatory authorities: local villagers, power grids, governments, etc.

分析风电场运行数据，提出优化运行方案，提高风电场发电效率。

Analyze wind farm operation data, propose optimization solutions, and improve wind farm power generation efficiency.

指导下属工作和学习，对项目员工进行培养，提升团队专业素质。

Guide subordinates in their work and learning, train project employees, and enhance the team's professional quality.

负责完成公司下发的关于设备设施的各类检查、排查和经验反馈。

Responsible for completing various inspections, investigations, and experience feedback on equipment and facilities issued by the company.

完成上级领导交代的其他任务。

Complete other tasks assigned by senior leadership.

二、任职要求（Requirement）

基本素质：

Basic quality：

爱岗敬业，品行端正，诚实守信；

Love and dedication to work, good character and integrity, honest and trustworthy.

有较强的责任心和主动性；

Strong sense of responsibility and initiative.

具备较强的执行力，以及良好的计划组织能力、沟通协调能力和学习创新能力；

Strong execution, as well as good planning and organizing skills, communication and coordination skills, and the ability to learn and innovate.

有较强的安全意识、廉洁意识和合规意识。

Strong awareness of safety, integrity and compliance.

岗位要求：

Job Requirements

本科及以上学历,安全管理、电气工程、电力生产、工程管理等相关专业；

Bachelor's degree or above, majoring in Safety Management, Electrical Engineering, Power Production, Engineering Management, or related fields.

5年以上工作经验，3年以上相关岗位工作经验，持有符合哈萨克斯坦要求5级电气证书；

More than 5 years of work experience, including at least 3 years in a relevant position, and holding a Level 5 Electrical Certificate as required by Kazakhstan.

熟悉哈萨克斯坦安全生产法规等法律法规及电气安全操作规程等电力行业标准；

Familiar with Kazakhstan's safety production regulations, other relevant laws and regulations, and electrical safety operation procedures, as well as power industry standards.

具备英语听说读写能力，英语可作为工作语言，同时熟悉中文者优先；

Ability to speak, read and write English as a working language, and familiarity with Chinese is preferred.

熟练使用OFFICE办公软件。

Proficient in using Office software.

title: Senior Consultant (CIO Advisory, Azerbaijan)
description:
We are looking for Senior Consultant for CIO Advisory in Azerbaijan.

Requirements

BSc or MSc in Computer Science/ Engineering/ Information Security/ Mathematics
More than 3 years of experience in business analytics/ IT architecture/ IT TOM, etc.
Experience in designing ERP system is an advantage.
Good knowledge of the principles of corporate systems (ERP, CBS, CRM, ITSM, etc.) and processes behind them, software development life cycle knowledge
Good knowledge of IT standards and methodology (COBIT, ITIL, NIST, Open Group, etc.)
Business processes modeling in specified notation (UML, BPMN, EPC)
Strong analytical skills, problem solving skills (able to identify and solve arising issues, proposes solutions in non-routine situations. Curious, open minded, seeks information from different sources and applies knowledge to develop solutions)
Passion for quality of personal contribution into project success
Experience in leading teams, coaching junior team members.
Certification in IT is an advantage.
Understanding of database concepts, knowledge of the MS SQL (composing and execution of the basic queries, etc.);
Experience in building analytical reports in BI tools (Power BI, Oracle BI, Qlik, etc.) is an advantage.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Azerbaijani. Knowledge of Russian or Turkish language is an advantage.
Excellent knowledge of MS Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint, ect.).

Key responsibilities and accountabilities

Participate in development of Digital strategy, IT strategy, IT architecture, target IT operating model, system architecture, functional requirements and other technical documentation for the clients
Develop technology concepts and design target system architecture, with focus on ERP solutions – analyze and design ERP system concepts and technical requirements, assess clients’ maturity level and readiness to implement ERP, assess the clients’ business processes (based on BTABoK, CMMI model, TOGAF, BPMN and UML notations, vendor-specific frameworks, etc.) and technical landscape to meet the target ERP state.
Analyze business strategy and goals, existing systems and applications, IT architecture, best practices in this area and suggest ways of optimizing and automating them.
Conduct technology selection and scoring, cost-benefit assessment to identify optimal technology solution for the clients.
Evaluate and design Digital & IT TOM (processes, people, service delivery model, governance), analyze IT governance processes and IT services and their maturity level using IT standards and methodologies (COBIT, ITIL, etc.), proposing ways of their improvement.
Synthesize own analysis and work results of junior team members, draw relevant conclusions, develop recommendations in terms of project.
Research and gather information in accordance with assignments, prepare analytical conclusions on the research results.
Distribute the project tasks to junior team members, monitor the task progress, guide and coach junior team members within the projects.
Prepare reports, presentations and other materials required for assignments, participate in the presentation of engagement reports to clients.
Assist project manager/director with project implementation approaches and methodology set up.
Communication with KPMG firms and employees, international KPMG network
Communication with clients, organize and lead client meetings within the project activities.

Take part in the business development of the group, prepare technical and commercial proposals for clients and other materials as part of pre-project activities.

title: Senior BI Analyst
description:
Are you ready to apply your distinct analytical abilities to fresh challenges? Utilize your expert BI and Business analysis comprehension to contribute to international projects across a variety of business domains: finance, retail and distribution, e-commerce, life sciences & healthcare, and more.

We're in search of a proficient BI Analyst to enhance our team of professionals who steer data-driven digital transformation. If you're interested in tackling BI analysis, working with data and utilizing best business analysis practices, then this role is for you.

In this role, you will lead the planning and execution of elicitation activities, collaborating closely with business and IT stakeholders.

This position offers remote setup with the flexibility to work from any location in Kazakhstan, whether it's your home or well-equipped offices in Astana, Almaty or Karaganda.

Responsibilities

Lead stakeholder workshops to define and prioritize business needs
Translate requirements into actionable insights, fostering seamless collaboration with the delivery team throughout the project lifecycle
Perform data discovery, data assessment and data profiling using SQL queries
Prepare source to target mappings, data models and data flows
Validate prototype for business alignment using mock-ups
Conduct Sprint review sessions or User Acceptance Testing with customer stakeholders
Collaborate with customer stakeholders in designing data products
Prepare post-development and post-production materials

Requirements
5 years of experience in data-related projects (e.g. data migration, data transformation, data governance, etc.)
3 years of expertise in handling BI, DWH, Data and Analytical project requirements (gathering, documenting, presenting, estimating, prioritizing, etc.)
Experience in Data Governance
Proficiency in end-to-end data and analytics project delivery using Agile and waterfall methodologies
Expertise in defining and organizing backlogs, including epics, features, and stories
Deep understanding of the Data Modeling and Data Quality
Proficiency in performing data profiling using SQL queries and conducting data quality analysis
Experience in preparing source-to-target mappings for data ingestion, curation, and related processes

Nice to have
Experience with data on cloud platforms like Azure, AWS and GCP
Skills in creating data prototypes
Industry knowledge in finance, insurance, oil and gas, supply chain or marketing
Ability to act as a Product Owner or Data Product Owner in analytical projects

We offer
We connect like-minded people: :
Delivering innovative solutions to industry leaders, making a global impact
Enjoyable working environment, whether it is the vibrant office or the comfort of your own home
Opportunity to work abroad for up to two months per year
Relocation opportunities within our offices in 55+ countries
Corporate and social events
We invest in your growth:  :
Leadership development, career advising, soft skills and well-being programs

We cover it all: :

EPAM is a team of technologists and innovators united by a passion for technology. In Kazakhstan, we operate across all cities with offices in Astana, Almaty, and Karaganda and work with the world's leading companies from different industries. In 2023, EPAM received the Export Excellence Award at the esteemed Digital Bridge Awards, showcasing our commitment to excellence and innovation.

title: Data Software Engineering Trainee
description:
Details

If you have strong Python programming skills and want to start a career in Data Software Engineering (prev. Big Data), then this program is what you need.

Our learning path includes two stages, offering you a step-by-step approach to gaining in-depth knowledge in this direction. By participating, you will have the opportunity to:

Gain expertise in software development technologies and Git
Dive into the capabilities of the leading public cloud platforms
Explore the design, development and maintenance of large data-volume software systems
Learn large-scale data handling technologies (Hadoop, Apache Spark, Kafka, etc.)

Training process

The program consists of two stages:

In the first stage, you will explore self-study materials at your convenience and complete assigned tasks with immediate automated feedback. Completing this stage usually takes ~3 months with ~10-12 hours of weekly engagement.
If you show good results and successfully pass a technical interview, we will invite you to the next stage. It usually lasts ~3 months and requires ~20 hours of weekly engagement. We will offer you a mentoring program with one-to-one meetings with production experts.

Upon program completion, you may be able to continue your career path according to demonstrated skills and available opportunities at EPAM.

What is required for training:

English speaking level from B2 (Upper-Intermediate) and higher
Strong Python programming skills
Practical experience in one of the additional languages (Java or Scala)
Solid knowledge of the Relational Database Management System (DBMS) theory
Good command of Structured Query Language (DML/DDL/DCL/TCL)
Theoretical knowledge of DWH/Data Lake and one of the visualization tools
Basic understanding of Linux, Docker and Kubernetes

title: Lead DevOps Engineer
description:
С кем вы будете работать?

Sergek Group – это профессионалы из разных сфер: разработка ПО, искусственный интеллект, компьютерное зрение, системная аналитика, проектный и продуктовый менеджмент, монтаж оборудовании, финансы, HR, PR и многое другое. Позиция Lead Devops Engineer входит в компанию Sergek Technology в проект Core.

Как вы сможете повлиять на результаты?

Вы сможете повысить стабильность, безопасность и эффективность инфраструктуры, автоматизируя процессы, внедряя современные инструменты DevOps и обеспечивая надежную поддержку команд разработки.

У нашего идеального кандидата:

Опыт работы с Docker: Уверенное владение Docker и Kubernetes, опыт работы с контейнеризацией приложений, оркестрацией инфраструктуры и автоматизации процессов.
Написание манифестов для запуска приложений в Kubernetes.
Опыт работы с виртуализацией: Знание и опыт работы с виртуализацией VMware, Proxmox, Red Hat.
Знание баз данных: Опыт работы с реляционными базами данных - уверенное знание PostgreSQL
Знание S3 протоколов: Понимание протоколов, используемых для взаимодействия с сервисами хранения данных, такими как Amazon S3 и Minio.
Уверенное пользование Git
Опыт работы с NFS: Знание сетевой файловой системы (NFS) и опыт работы с ней для обеспечения доступа к файлам и ресурсам на удаленных серверах.
Протоколы: Расширенное знание протоколов, HTTP, POP3, IMAP, SMTP, SSH, FTP, DHCP и т.д.
Сеть: Расширенные знания о сетях, адресация, трассировка, порты. (TCP, UDP)
Навыки мониторинга и обнаружения проблем: Уверенное пользование Prometheus, VictoriaMetrics, Grafana для оперативного выявления и решения проблем в инфраструктуре. Опыт использования и настройка централизированного хранения логов — Loki, VictoriaLogs

Чем вы будете заниматься?

Конфигурация и управление инфраструктурой: Ответственность за создание, настройку и управление инфраструктурными ресурсами, включая серверы, сети, хранилища данных и сервисы облачных провайдеров.
Автоматизация процессов: Разработка скриптов и инструментов для автоматизации развертывания, масштабирования и управления приложениями и инфраструктурой.
Управление контейнерами: Работа с контейнерами Docker для упаковки, доставки и запуска приложений, а также оркестрация контейнеров с помощью Docker Swarm и Kubernetes.
Настройка и обслуживание баз данных: Установка, настройка и обслуживание различных баз данных, таких как PostgreSQL и обеспечение их высокой производительности и uptime.
Мониторинг и обнаружение проблем: Настройка систем мониторинга для отслеживания состояния инфраструктуры и приложений, а также реагирование на проблемы и автоматизация процессов восстановления.
Обеспечение безопасности: Разработка и внедрение мер безопасности для защиты инфраструктуры и данных, включая управление доступом, шифрование и мониторинг угроз.
Разработка CI/CD пайплайнов: Создание и поддержка непрерывных интеграции и доставки (CI/CD) пайплайнов для автоматизации процессов разработки, тестирования и развертывания приложений, в том числе в условиях закрытого сетевого контура.
Поддержка и отладка: Реагирование на проблемы и запросы от команды разработки или пользователей (внутренние заказчики), а также участие в отладке и решении проблем, связанных с инфраструктурой.

Что мы предлагаем?

Уникальная возможность работать в инновационной и динамичной команде, создающей решения для умных городов (Smart City).
Перспективы профессионального роста и обучения, а также доступ к курсам и тренингам за счет компании (после испытательного срока).
Дополнительные экстра-дни отдыха помимо стандартных отпускных и больничных — мы заботимся о балансе между работой и личной жизнью.
Материальная помощь по важным личным событиям и на подготовку к отпуску.
Формат работы: первые 1-3 месяца - в офисе, далее гибрид/удаленка.

title: Senior Consultant (Transport & Logistics), Strategy group, Consulting Department
description:
We’re currently seeking aSenior Consultant to join our Strategy & Operations team in Astana. In this dynamic role, you’ll collaborate with top-tier clients, lead diverse projects, and develop strategic insights across industries. Join us and leverage your expertise to drive success and make a real difference!

As our Senior Consultant you will:

Assist in delivering complex engagements, taking charge of specific workstreams and ensuring alignment with scope, budget, schedule, and quality requirements.
Lead or support hypothesis generation, data analysis, storyboarding, client interviews, and problem-solving to develop insights and recommendations.
Collaborate with local and global KPMG advisory teams to deliver impactful solutions.
Manage, inspire, and guide team members, contributing to capacity building and recruitment efforts.
Structure case problem-solving, assign tasks, and evaluate team performance.
Leverage global expertise to strengthen local project management, strategy implementation, and transport and logistics capabilities.

You’re a great fit if you:

Have a minimum of 3 yearsof experience in a client-facing strategy role within the transport and logistics sector, major strategy firms, boutique strategy firms, Big 3/4 firms, or state, quasi-state, or private companies; 5+ years of relevant experience is a strong asset.
Hold a Bachelor’s degree from a top-tier university in Economics, Finance, Transportation, Logistics, Engineering, or a related field; Master’s degree or MBA is a significant advantage.
Demonstrate experience in the transportation sector, including operators (airlines, shipping lines, logistics, railways, etc.), infrastructure management (airports, ports, roads, rail), or service providers.
Have proven expertise in advising on strategic matters, with strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Are fluent in Russian and English, both verbally and in writing, with additional languages being a plus.
Bring experience in corporate development, financial modeling, data analytics, and the ability to develop transport models or forecasts (an advantage).
Possess strong presentation, data analytics, and client-focused skills, with a proactive, team-oriented mindset, capable of multitasking and adapting to changing project needs.
Are available for travel.

Diversity & Inclusion Statement

We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment regardless of their unique abilities, background, or identity.

title: Data аналитик
description:
Построй аналитику с нуля и влияй на стратегию бизнеса

Мы в TrustMe ищем не просто аналитика.
Мы ищем архитектора данных, который с нуля выстроит систему, способную стать основой для стратегических решений.

Задача амбициозная:
Создать всю аналитику с чистого листа — от метрик и пайплайна до мощных BI-дэшбордов.
Если вы хотите не «улучшать чужое», а строить своё, — вам сюда.

Что предстоит делать:

Определить ключевые метрики и объяснить бизнесу, что действительно важно измерять

Настроить сбор и хранение данных (Google Sheets, SQL, BigQuery и др.)

Подготовить структуру базы данных и выстроить ETL-процессы

Построить первые BI-отчёты и дашборды (Power BI, Looker, Tableau, Metabase и т.д.)

Помогать команде принимать решения на основе данных

Регулярно проверять корректность и актуальность данных

Что мы ожидаем:

Опыт в аналитике от 1 года (или сильное портфолио с кейсами, если вы уверенный junior)

Уверенное знание SQL

Владение Excel / Google Sheets и инструментами визуализации

Понимание бизнес-метрик: LTV, CAC, retention, воронки, конверсии

Самостоятельность и готовность взять на себя ответственность за весь аналитический блок

➕ Будет плюсом:

Навыки Python для анализа данных

Опыт в стартапах или динамичных проектах

Умение смотреть на данные с позиции продукта и бизнеса

Что мы предлагаем:

График работы 5/2, на выбор: с 9:00 до 18:00 или с 10:00 до 19:00

Возможность выстроить аналитику с нуля и реально влиять на рост компании

Никакой бюрократии — только скорость, доверие и результат

Офис, в котором ценят эффективность, инициативу и ум

Если вы устали от табличек по инерции и хотите делать аналитику, которая меняет бизнес, — мы ждём вас.

Здесь вы не «аналитик в отделе», а голос данных в компании.

Чтобы лучше понять ваш опыт, просим в сопроводительном письме ответить на 5 коротких вопросов:
1 Приходилось ли вам выстраивать аналитику с нуля: от сбора данных до дашбордов? Какие инструменты использовали?
2 С какими базами данных и языками (SQL, Python и др.) вы работали? Какие задачи решали?
3 В каких BI-инструментах вы визуализировали данные? Приведите примеры дашбордов.
4 Какие метрики и отчёты вы внедряли для принятия бизнес-решений?
5 С какими трудностями в аналитике сталкивались и как их решали?


Ваши ответы помогут нам быстрее рассмотреть отклик и пригласить вас на интервью!

title: Системный аналитик
description:
Обязанности:
Сбор и анализ требований:
Документирование функциональных и нефункциональных требований.
Разработка и поддержка документации:
Создание технических заданий, спецификаций, схем и других документов, необходимых для разработки ПО.
Обновление документации в процессе разработки и поддержка её актуальности.
Моделирование бизнес-процессов:
Анализ и моделирование текущих бизнес-процессов.
Разработка предложений по их оптимизации и автоматизации.
Взаимодействие с командой разработки:
Обеспечение команды разработчиков необходимой информацией и разъяснениями по требованиям.
Участие в планировании спринтов, ретроспективах и других мероприятиях команды.
Контроль выполнения требований:
Участие в тестировании программного обеспечения для проверки соответствия реализованного функционала требованиям.
Проведение демонстраций для заказчиков и стейкхолдеров.
Анализ и решение проблем:
Выявление и анализ проблем, возникающих в процессе разработки и эксплуатации ПО.
Предложение и внедрение решений для устранения выявленных проблем.
Требования:
Опыт работы в качестве системного аналитика:
Практический опыт сбора, анализа и документирования требований к программным
системам.
Опыт работы с различными методологиями анализа, включая UML, BPMN.
Знание основ разработки ПО:
Понимание жизненного цикла разработки программного обеспечения.
Знание различных методологий разработки, таких как Agile, Scrum, Waterfall.
Опыт работы с инструментами для анализа и управления требованиями:
Владение инструментами для моделирования и документирования (например, JIRA, Confluence).
Навыки управления проектами:
Умение планировать и координировать работу.
Опыт работы с диаграммами Ганта и другими инструментами управления проектами.
Умение работать с базами данных:
Понимание основ работы с реляционными и нереляционными базами данных.
Опыт написания SQL-запросов для извлечения и анализа данных.
Коммуникационные навыки:
Способность ясно и четко излагать мысли как в устной, так и в письменной форме.
Умение эффективно взаимодействовать с различными стейкхолдерами, включая заказчиков, разработчиков и тестировщиков.
Аналитические способности:
Умение быстро понимать сложные системы и процессы.
Способность выявлять проблемы и предлагать оптимальные решения.
Условия:
Конкурентоспособная заработная плата, ежегодные бонусы;
Официальное трудоустройство, оплачиваемые отпуска и больничные;
Социальный пакет (фитнес, медицинское страхование, корпоративные мероприятия);
Поддержка профессионального роста: обучение за счет компании.
skills: BPMN,Atlassian Confluence,Системный анализ,Анализ требований,Atlassian Jira,Agile,Scrum,Kanban,SQL,Анализ данных

title: Бизнес-аналитик
Junior Allocation Specialist в компанию INTERMODE (Lacoste, Converse, Superstep)
description:
General Qualifications:

Graduated from relevant university departments (mathematics, engineering),
Knowledge in MS Office and 1C programs will be a plus,
Preferably fluent in English,
Analytical thinker, results-oriented,
Strong communication skills and ability to work in a team.

Job Description:

Analysing sales potentials of responsible channels during the season, and planning action plans,
Contributing to the use and enhancement of first Distribution, Replenishment, and Transfer systems throughout the season,
Making inter-channel transfer decisions based on sales performance during the season.
Special Period Planning; checking the quantity needs before special periods such as holidays, preparing special action plans, presenting them to managers, and coordinating the process,
Controlling/tracking and coordinating logistics shipment movements; ensuring timely delivery of approved reserves to stores and reporting to upper management, actively participating in system improvement proposals,
Involvement in business development processes of online sales channels, conducting analysis and feasibility studies,
Coordinating the creation, development, and implementation of annual, monthly, and weekly campaign plans.
Ensuring the creation of shipment plans by conducting monthly and weekly needs analyses of relevant sales channels,
Analysing future sales potential and changes in sales trends, and planning actions accordingly,
Preparing consolidated reports on a daily/weekly/monthly basis and reporting to managers,
Establishing a structure to automate repetitive and standardized workflows to effectively manage productivity.

title: System analyst (DWH)
Senior Angular Frontend Developer
description:
Company Description:

We are a technology-driven company specializing in artificial intelligence, machine learning, computer vision, fintech, and e-KYC solutions. Our mission is to enhance the speed and accessibility of financial and identity verification services through cutting-edge innovation. We design and develop proprietary identity verification products that empower businesses and individuals alike. As a Senior Frontend Engineer, you will play a pivotal role in shaping our solutions, building scalable features, and delivering technology that serves tens of thousands of users daily.

Role Description:

This is a full-time hybrid role for a Senior Frontend Developer at Verigram located in Almaty, with flexibility for remote work. The Senior Frontend Developer will be responsible for day-to-day tasks related to back-end web development, front-end development, responsive web design, software development, and web development.

Main Responsibilities:

Development and maintenance of client libraries (SDKs) that facilitate the operation of products related to computer vision, machine learning models, and internal company tools.

Collaboration with design teams and backend developers to create the end product.

Support and optimization of existing code to improve performance and ease of use.

Participation in product planning processes, including requirements identification, technical design, and task time estimation.

Writing unit and acceptance tests.

Writing clean, modular, robust code to implement required functionalities.

Establishing/optimizing frontend development processes.

Implementation of DORA metrics (or similar) into the frontend development process.

Candidate Requirements:

More than 5 years of experience in frontend development.

Leadership/mentoring skills for a small team of frontend developers.

Knowledge of CI/CD practices.

Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks and libraries (Angular).

Experience developing Angular applications with TypeScript.

Strong understanding of fundamental concepts and principles of clean code

Experience with RESTful APIs.

Understanding of UI design principles and UX.

Experience with version control systems, Git.

Portfolio with work examples is desirable.

Desirable Skills:

Experience with Java Spring Boot and SOAP APIs.

Champion of Agile methodologies.

Strong networking and negotiation skills.

We Offer:

Opportunity to be part of a fast-growing AI-driven organization.

Work on products used by hundreds of thousands of users.

Friendly, supportive, and innovative work environment.

Competitive salary based on experience and skills.

Clear career growth path with professional development opportunities.

Paid sick leave and vacation.

Flexible working hours with a hybrid work model.

title: M&A Senior Consultant, Deal Advisory
description:
Are you ready to make a real impact in the world of Mergers & Acquisitions? Do you have a passion for corporate finance and enjoy working on complex transactions? If so, this role could be your next career step!

We are currently looking for an experienced Associate (Senior Consultant) to join our M&A team in Astana / Almaty. With a dynamic team and opportunities for professional growth, this role will help you expand your expertise in M&A while making a difference for top-tier clients.

As our M&A Associate, you will:

M&A Process Support: Provide full-scope technical support and actively participate at all stages of the M&A process, including data collection, financial modeling, indicative pricing, and structuring key transaction documents.
Data Room and Due Diligence Coordination: Coordinate the preparation of data rooms and manage the due diligence process through regular interaction with clients, investors, and due diligence teams.
Business Development Support: Contribute to business development by gathering and analyzing market information, preparing marketing materials (pitches, proposals, company profiles), and identifying potential transaction targets.
Coaching and Mentorship: Coach junior team members on the specifics of the M&A process and monitor their performance to ensure high-quality work.
Market Research: Conduct thorough market research, including analyzing key drivers, players, trends, and potential targets relevant to ongoing and future transactions.

You’re the perfect match for this role if you:

Hold a Bachelor’s degree in Finance or Economics with a strong academic record.
Have at least 3 years of experience in corporate finance, M&A advisory, or working at an investment bank, Big 4 firm, or large corporation.
Possess strong knowledge of financial accounting, valuation methodologies, and key research sources like MergerMarket, Thomson Financial, Bloomberg, and Factiva.
Are fluent in English and Russian, with Kazakh being an advantage.
Adapt quickly to changing environments and demonstrate strong analytical, interpersonal, and communication skills.
Are driven, with a creative mindset and the ability to solve problems effectively.
Hold ACCA or CFA certification (is a plus).

Diversity & Inclusion Statement

We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment regardless of their unique abilities, background, or identity.

title: Middle ML Engineer (NLP)
Data Analyst/BI analyst
description:
Мы ищем Аналитика, который поможет нам принимать обоснованные решения на основе данных, анализировать эффективность и разрабатывать стратегии для увеличения рентабельности

Основные обязанности:

Выгрузка данных из БД: регулярная отчетность и ad-hoc запросы;
Анализ данных в таблицах БД на предмет полноты и актуальности, поиск ошибок;
Написание бизнес-требований разработчикам на доработки и устранение ошибок;

Ведение технической и методологической документации по своим задачам и проектам.

Ожидания от кандидата:

Стаж работы по специальности от 3 лет
Высшее техническое образование

title: Инженер по химическим процессам/Chemical Process Engineer
description:
QAZAQ SODA - это возводимый крупный химический комплекс (производство кальцинированной соды), расположенный в Сарысуском районе Жамбыла. Начало производства запланировано на осень 2026 года. Удаленность от ближайшего населенного пункта - села Саудакент - превышает 20 км, от административного центра района - города Жанатас (Zhanatas) - около 35 км. Кальцинированная сода является 10-м по потреблению неорганическим соединением в мире, которое используется уже более 5000 лет. Это безопасное, простое соединение и ключевой компонент в различных промышленных процессах - от производства стекла до сухих порошковых моющих средств и литий-ионных аккумуляторов. Это также важный ингредиент в пищевой и фармацевтической промышленности. Мы ищем сотрудников со следующей квалификацией для работы на нашем предприятии.

QAZAQ SODAis a big Chemical Complex ( Soda Ash Production ) located in the Sarysu district of Zhambyl under construction. Production is scheduled to begin in the fall of 2026.

The remoteness of the plant from the nearest settlement - Saudakent village - exceeds 20 km, from the administrative centre of the district - Zhanatas town - about 35 km .

Soda Ash is the 10th most consumed inorganic compound in the world, which has been used for over 5,000 years. It is a safe, simple compound and a key component in a variety of industrial processes from the manufacture of glass to dry powder detergents and lithium-ion batteries. It is also an important ingredient in the food and pharmaceutical industries.

We are looking for teammates with the following qualifications to work in our facility.

Чтобы Ваше резюме было рассмотрено более детально, просим предоставить ваше резюме на английском

Обязанности:

Мониторинг и оптимизация процессов: Контроль и оптимизация химических процессов, связанных с производством кальцинированной соды; мониторинг параметров реакции.
- Разработка параметров: Установление оптимальных условий (температура, давление, состав реагентов) для обеспечения качества продукции.
- Контроль качества: Управление контролем качества сырья и готовой продукции, анализ данных процесса.
- Безопасность и соблюдение требований: Обеспечение соблюдения технологических и экологических стандартов безопасности.
- Документация: Разработка технологической документации, стандартных операционных процедур (СОП) и производственных отчетов.
- Сотрудничество с отделом исследований и разработок: работа с отделом исследований и разработок для внедрения инновационных решений и повышения эффективности процессов.
Responsibilities:
Process Monitoring and Optimization: Oversee and optimize chemical processes involved in calcined soda production; monitor reaction parameters.

Parameter Development: Establish optimal conditions (temperature, pressure, reagent composition) to ensure product quality.

Quality Control: Manage quality control of raw materials and finished products, analyze process data.

Safety and Compliance: Ensure adherence to technological and environmental safety standards.

Documentation: Develop process documentation, standard operating procedures (SOPs), and production reports.

Collaboration with R&D: Work with the research and development team to implement innovative solutions and enhance process efficiency

Требования:
Оконченное 4 или более лет образование в области ХИМИЧЕСКОГО ИНЖИНИРИНГА в высших учебных заведениях. Вы можете быть рассмотрены на следующие позиции в зависимости от стажа работы. Просим указывать во время отклика какому референсу Вы соответствуете:
Референс 1. Для менеджера по химическим процессам. Опыт работы в должности Супервайзера/менеджера отдела более 6 лет.
Референс 2.Для главного инженера по химическим процессам. Опыт работы в должности Супервайзера/менеджера отдела более 2-3 лет.
Референс 3.Для инженера по химическим процессам. Опыт работы в должности Супервайзера/менеджера отдела более 0-2 лет.
Опыт работы на предприятиях химического производства.
производить - управлять оборудованием и людьми в процессе - проводить эксперименты в химической лаборатории. знать химические процессы
Знание английского и турецкого языков.

Хорошие знания о:

Клапаны
Двигатели
Насосы
Электронные измерительные приборы
Трубы
Компрессоры
Фильтры
Химическое оборудование
Реакторы
Сушилки
Кальцинаторы
Охладители
Нагреватели....
Градирни

Requirements:

Completed 4 or more years of education in CHEMICAL ENGINEERING from a tertiary institution. You may be considered for the following positions depending on your work experience. Please indicate at the time of response which reference you meet:
Ref. 1. For Chemical Process Manager. Experience as Supervisor/Department Manager for more than 6 years.
Ref. 2.For Chief Chemical Process Engineer. Experience as Supervisor/Department Manager for more than 2-3 years.
Ref. 3.For Chemical Process Engineer. Experience as Supervisor/Department Manager for more than 0-2 years.
Experience in chemical manufacturing plants.
Produce - manage equipment and people in the process - conduct experiments in chemical laboratory.Know chemical processes
Knowledge of English and Turkish language.

Translated with DeepL.com (free version)

Good knowledge about:

Valves
Motors
Pumps
Electronic Measurement Instruments
Pipes
Compressors
Filters
Chemical Equipment’s
Reactors
Dryers
Calciners
Coolers
Heaters….
Water Cooling Towers

Условия:
Возможности для предоставления Трансфер на транспорте из села Саудакент или из г.Жанатас, ночевка на территории завода, питание
Opportunities to provide Transfer from Saudakent village or Zhanatas city, overnight stay on the territory of the plant, meals.

title: Production Engineer
company: ТОО Coca-Cola İçecek Kazakhstan  ( ТОО СП «Кока-Кола Алматы Боттлерс» )
description:
Job Identification
We are looking for a Production Engineer to be a part of our Supply Chain team located in Almaty.
Main Responsibilities
Plan, develop and realize protective and preventive maintenance programs in order to ensure compliance of machines
Ensure realization of planned production program
Carry out production according to the defined standards of process and taking actions to improve the process
Ensure that material yields are within company standards
Develop work safety procedures, make sure the team under supervision follows rules
Set up machine maintenances according to plans
Carry out criteria assessments and prepare the report for continuous improvement and performance follow up, present it to management, plan and implement necessary corrective-preventive actions
Determine training needs of foremen, operator and technician
Make sure the team under supervision follows safety procedures and rules
Manage the line OPEX budget and equipment investment projects
Improve the production methods for developing the quality of the packages & products
Manage the spare parts stock level
Ensure that the GMP and 6S rules are followed
Minimize the production costs and losses
Requirements
University Graduate (Mechanical, Electrical / Electronics Engineering)
Minimum 1-2 years experience in production field
Upper-Intermediate level of English
Good command of Microsoft Office programs
Strong communication and leadership skills
‘’We're an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, sex, color, national or social origin, ethnicity, religion, age, pregnancy, disability, sexual orientation, gender expression or political opinion.’’
What We Embrace:
“People Centered” Focus
Equal Salary Advocate
A Globally Diverse/An International Workplace
Inclusive Team-Building Activities
Digital Learning Opportunities
Leadership Exposure With Organizational Events
Inclusive Language And Culture
Social Clubs/Networks
Inclusive/Family-Friendly Policies
Who We Are
CCI is a multinational beverage company operating in Azerbaijan, Iraq, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Pakistan, Syria, Tajikistan, Turkey, Turkmenistan, and Uzbekistan. CCI produces, distributes, and sells The Coca-Cola Company's sparkling and still beverages. With 30 bottling plants, 3 fruit processing plants, and more than 10,000 employees in 11 countries, CCI offers a wide range of beverages to a consumer base of 430 million.
Our purpose at CCI is to create value for our employees, customers, consumers, and community. In line with our vision to become the best FMCG company, we put people at the core of everything we do. We achieve successful results with our people who come together as One Team, committing to live by our shared values of passion, integrity, accountability, and teamwork. Our ambition is to become a great place to work, which is inclusive, diverse, and inspiring, with its key organizational and leadership capabilities.
Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our commitment at CCI, that's why we nurture it in everything we do. We are proud to become the fourth company to obtain the EQUAL-SALARY global certification and proud to be an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer, covering in all our countries.
We take responsibility for the future with our Sustainability Commitments for 2030.
Focusing our roadmap on six main areas, including packaging, water, and climate on environmental issues; human rights, diversity & inclusion, and community investments on social issues, we pledged 9 commitments to continuously improve our efforts. To ensure that by the year 2030, 35% of newly hired individuals, 40% of managerial positions, and 50% of executive committee members are comprised of women.

title: QA инженер

What We Offer:

If you are passionate about quality and ready to grow with an international tech company — we are waiting for you!
Apply now and become part of the Yesim journey!

The Document Controller is responsible for managing and maintaining all Fit-Out project related documents in a systematic and organized manner.

This role ensures that all documents are accurate, up to date, properly distributed and securely stored in accordance with company standards and Fit-Out project requirements.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

Receive, review, register, track and distribute all incoming and outgoing Fit-Out project documents, including letters, drawings, reports, contracts, RFIs, submittals, invoices, and other technical documentation.
Keep accurate records using document logs, trackers, and registers.
Clearly understand the purpose of each technical document (e.g., For Review, For Approval, For Construction, For Record, etc.)
Prepare document packages and make sure they are issued with the correct transmittal forms.
Make sure all documents are saved and organized properly in the EDMS (Asite, Aconex).
Monitor the flow of documents between Fit-Out contractors, consultants, suppliers, and internal teams.
Ensure all documents follow the company's document control procedures and meet project requirements.
Help project team by providing fast and easy access to up-to-date documents.
Work with engineering, procurement, and construction teams to keep documents moving smoothly.
Create and send out document transmittals, regular reports, and trackers.
Make sure the latest versions of all documents are easy to find and use.
Organize and archive all Fit-Out documents properly, both in soft format and hard copy.
Use a consistent document and drawing numbering system, based on company rules.
Share project related documents with internal teams and, when needed, with external partners.
Support engineers with all Fit-Out project documentation by effectively managing and organizing all related documents.
Manage all incoming and outgoing correspondence for the Fit-Out department and ensure it's shared on time.
Have good working knowledge of SharePoint for sharing and managing documents.
Be familiar with how to upload large volumes of documents into the EDMS.
Understand the differences between design and as-built technical documentation to ensure accurate handling and processing within the Fit-Out team.
Handling and consolidating comments for design documentation from the engineering team in accordance with the engineering system disciplines and properly addressing them to consultants.
Prepare meeting minutes and protocols as required.

TECHNICAL AND INTERPERSONAL SKILLS

Proven experience in managing quality documentation processes.
High level of accuracy and attention to detail.
Strong working knowledge of web-based tools, MS Outlook, Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.
General knowledge of how document control works in construction projects.
Basic knowledge of Electronic Document Management Systems (EDMS).

title: Professor (Associate Professor) in Computer Science
description:
Programme: Computer Science

School: School of Arts and Sciences
Reports to: Associate Dean, Naryn Campus
Duty Station: Naryn Campus, Naryn, Kyrgyzstan
Application Deadline: 19 May 2025
Contract Period: Fixed term for 2 years, renewable with potential transition to open-ended contract after 2 years

Position Summary

The University of Central Asia (UCA) is excited to offer a full-time residential faculty position in the Department of Computer Science at our Naryn Campus. This is an excellent opportunity for those passionate about research and teaching to contribute to a world-class undergraduate programme in Computer Science, originally developed in collaboration with the University of Toronto. As a faculty member, you will play an essential role in delivering cutting-edge courses, shaping an innovative curriculum, and engaging in impactful research that drives both academic excellence and regional development.

The position offers an outstanding platform for research leadership and academic collaboration, with an emphasis on shaping UCA’s research profile both locally and internationally. Faculty will also have the opportunity to engage in cross-disciplinary initiatives alongside UCA’s Graduate School of Development, focusing on high-impact areas such as Digital Policy, Cybersecurity, and Data Science. We are particularly eager to encourage applications from female scholars, supporting their contributions to advancing the field of Computer Science.

This position offers a unique opportunity to contribute to a growing institution with ambitious goals for regional impact and academic excellence. If you are a passionate, innovative, and forward-thinking educator and researcher, we encourage you to apply.

Qualification requirements

Minimum Qualifications

Ph.D. from a reputable university with specialization in Computer Science or Computer Engineering and a proven track record of research outputs, supervision and leadership.

Preference will be given to candidates with a proven and outstanding track record of teaching and research in Computer Science and having practical and research experience in different fields of computer science.

Fluency in English is required.

Outstanding record of research publication, knowledge exchange, impact and grant capture in collaborative projects.

Why Join UCA?

Impactful Teaching and Research: Contribute to an academic institution that is dedicated to fostering innovation and development in Central Asia and beyond.

Collaboration and Growth: Be part of a diverse, interdisciplinary academic environment, with opportunities for collaboration and research across multiple fields of societal relevance.

Regional Leadership: Lead the development of innovative solutions to regional challenges in technology, data science, and digital policy.

Support for Female Scholars: UCA is deeply committed to supporting female scholars in STEM fields, providing opportunities to further advance gender equity in academia

Teaching experience requirements:

Demonstrated subject knowledge and application in delivery across diverse core and elective courses;

A demonstrated commitment to teaching and student learning experience. At least 5 years of teaching experience at the undergraduate level is expected;

Experience of using and experimenting with innovative teaching methods and evaluation methodologies;

The priority will be given to candidates who have experience in teaching the following courses:

Final Year Project I

Final Year Project II

Computer Architecture

Data Science

Software Engineering

Computer Networks

Mobile App Development

Internet of Things

Engage with the development of postgraduate programmes.

Research experience requirements:

A proven ability to publish research in web of sciences impact factor journals, Scopus indexed journals, ACM and AAAI conferences, NeurIPS, ICML or other top computer science venues;

Leadership in knowledge exchange, developmental impact, collaborative research projects and grant capture;

Aware of current and future industry trends; strong network of industry contacts to support internship programs, project collaborations and industrial mentoring;

Interest in publishing research papers and working on research projects with undergraduate students.

Duties

Key Responsibilities

Teaching: Deliver courses across the Computer Science undergraduate curriculum, including courses on theoretical foundations, applied programming, and hardware concepts. Engage students through interactive lessons, hands-on projects, and practical lab work.

Curriculum Development: Contribute to the development and continuous improvement of the Computer Science curriculum, ensuring it remains at the forefront of global advancements in the field.

Research Leadership: Lead innovative research initiatives that align with UCA’s mission to drive regional development, especially in the areas of technology, innovation, and sustainability. Forge partnerships with industry, government, and academic institutions, both regionally and internationally.

Collaboration and community engagement: Foster synergies between the Computer Science department and other academic programs at UCA, particularly those focused on Data Science, Cybersecurity, Digital Policy and the development of the Central Asian Data Hub, through UCA’s Graduate School of Development.

About UCA’s Academic Programmes

UCA’s School of Arts and Sciences combines the best of a student-centred liberal arts environment with the intellectual rigor of a research university. The faculty is committed to offering an inclusive, engaging, and dynamic academic experience, delivered in English, to ensure that students are prepared to contribute meaningfully to both regional and global challenges. UCA encourages collaborative teaching, especially across disciplines such as Economics, Media and Communications, and Earth and Environmental Sciences, which provides opportunities for faculty to engage in a wide range of cross-disciplinary research.

Our Graduate School of Development is actively developing postgraduate programmes and focuses on research in areas such as Digital Policy and Cybersecurity. This provides additional opportunities for collaboration and knowledge exchange, allowing faculty to engage with and contribute to global developments in these fields.

Computer Science Programme Overview

UCA’s Computer Science programme is designed to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of technology, from mathematical foundations to applied programming skills. The curriculum is built to empower students to engage with all aspects of the technology world, whether by launching a technology start-up or pursuing graduate studies. In addition to theoretical courses, students participate in hands-on lab work and practical projects that challenge them to solve real-world problems. Annual internships provide students with industry exposure and help build professional connections. The curriculum’s strong emphasis on interdisciplinary learning also allows students to apply their skills across a variety of fields, including business, development, and policy.

UCA Background:

The University of Central Asia (UCA) was founded in 2000 as a private, not for profit, secular university through an International Treaty signed by the Presidents of Tajikistan, Kyrgyzstan and Kazakhstan, and His Highness the Aga Khan; ratified by their respective parliaments, and registered with the United Nations. The Presidents are the Patrons of the University and His Highness is the Chancellor. UCA’s mission is to promote the social and economic development of Central Asia, particularly its mountain communities, by offering an internationally recognised standard of higher education and becoming a leading research university in the region and internationally. UCA brings with it the broader commitment and partnership of the Aga Khan Development Network.

Conditions

Please submit your application (cover letter, CV and contact information of three references) by 19 May 2025.

Applications will be reviewed when received. Early applications are strongly encouraged.

Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

title: Executive Assistant to Chief Executive Officer
description:
About the job

Role Summary:

We are seeking a highly capable and versatile Executive Assistant to support the Principals of a private family office. This is not a conventional assistant role—it combines traditional executive support with strong analytical responsibilities, project oversight, and personal support functions for the family. The successful candidate will be intellectually sharp, detail-oriented, discreet, tech-savvy, and highly organized.

This individual must have excellent English and Russian language skills, a strong academic background in accounting or finance, and professional experience in accounting or finance-related roles. They should also be able and willing to relocate to Dubai and support the Principals closely in both business and private matters.

Key Responsibilities:

Executive Support:

Provide comprehensive administrative and logistical support to the Principals, including calendar management, travel arrangements, and meeting coordination.
Prepare high-quality written and presentation materials in English.
Ensure confidentiality and handle sensitive information with the utmost discretion.

Analytical & Project Responsibilities:

Support the review and monitoring of investment projects, reports, and business operations across different sectors and geographies.
Perform financial and operational analysis; build and manage Excel-based models or project trackers.
Assist with research, data collection, and presentations for new and ongoing business initiatives.
Liaise with stakeholders, advisors, and service providers across multiple jurisdictions.

Personal & Family Support:

Handle a range of personal tasks and errands, from document handling to property management support.
Assist with family scheduling, appointments, and logistics.
Coordinate with household staff or service providers as needed.

Ideal Candidate Profile:

Education & Experience:

Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Accounting, Finance, Economics, or related fields from a top-tier university.
Prior experience in a similar executive assistant, analyst, or project coordinator role.
Accounting or finance background with an understanding of financial principles is essential.

Skills & Competencies:

Excellent command of English and Russian (spoken and written).
Highly proficient in Microsoft Office, particularly Excel.
Tech-savvy with the ability to quickly adapt to new tools and software.
Analytical and structured thinker with a problem-solving mindset.
Strong time management and prioritization skills.
High level of discretion, loyalty, and emotional intelligence.
Flexible, proactive, and resilient.

Other Requirements:

Willingness to relocate to Dubai (support for visa and relocation will be provided).

Compensation & Benefits:

Competitive salary package, depending on experience and qualifications.
Housing and relocation assistance.
Opportunity to work closely with top decision-makers on high-impact projects.
Comprehensive medical insurance.
Support for gym or sports memberships.
Coverage for professional development courses and certifications.

title: Middle/Senior Front‑End Software Engineer (React / Next.js)
description:
Investbanq is an AI-powered wealth operating system for family offices, asset managers and banks. We are empowering traditional financial institutions to rapidly transform into AI-driven WealthTech players, enabling them to effectively capitalize on the growing wealth transfer to affluent millennials and other digital natives across emerging Asia and MENA. We are scaling quickly across Asia and MENA and are assembling a high‑calibre engineering team to power our next phase of growth.

Why this role matters

The UI is the product for our customers. You’ll own everything the user sees and touches – from SSR‑optimised pages that load in under 1 s to complex dashboards that stream market data in real‑time. You’ll collaborate closely with design, backend, and product to translate business logic into intuitive, accessible interfaces that stand up to enterprise security and compliance requirements.

Tech stack

Frameworks & Lang – React 18, Next.js 14, TypeScript 5
UI / Styling – AntDesign, Tailwind CSS, CSS Modules, Storybook
State & Data – React Query, Apollo Client
Tooling – ESLint, Prettier, GitLab CI/CD
Deployment – AWS CloudFront + S3, ECS (Fargate) for SSR


Responsibilities

Build elegant, resilient UIs

develop features with React + TypeScript and Next.js (SSR / ISR)
compose reusable components with Ant Design and Tailwind CSS, extending our design‑token system

Make it blazing fast & accessible

optimise Core Web Vitals, implement code‑splitting, lazy loading, and image optimisation

Integrate with a modern backend

consume REST & GraphQL APIs (Apollo / React Query); handle streaming updates via WebSockets / SSE
manage complex state while keeping bundle size lean

Own the full lifecycle

review PRs, participate in RFCs, and drive front‑end architecture decisions
instrument apps with analytics and tracing; work with DevOps on CDN, edge caching, and observability

Requirements

Must-have

3 + years building production SPAs in React + TypeScript
solid knowledge of Next.js SSR/ISR, routing, and data‑fetch patterns
CSS mastery: Tailwind, CSS‑in‑JS, responsive & cross‑browser techniques
testing discipline (Jest, RTL, Cypress/Playwright)
comfortable using REST & GraphQL APIs; understanding of caching and pagination
git workflow, CI/CD pipelines, and code review best practices
clear written & verbal English; thrive in distributed teams

Nice-to-have

experience with financial dashboards, charting libs (e.g., Recharts, Highcharts)
familiarity with Edge Functions, Next.js App Router, or RSC
design‑system stewardship (Storybook, Figma tokens)
performance profiling with Lighthouse, WebPageTest, or Chrome DevTools
experience with WebSockets/SSE and real‑time data visualisation
knowledge of accessibility audits and automated tooling (axe, pa11y)
OSS contributions, tech blogging, or speaking engagements

Working conditions

Hybrid - 3 days in the office per week
Location: Almaty, Gagarin Av., 310
Employment status: Official, in accordance with the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan

title: Creatio Certified Developer / Implementation Specialist
description:
Creatio Certified Developer and Implementation Specialist

3-6 years of experience

About us

Velvetech, is an American global software development company headquartered in Miami, FL, and with an office in Chicago, IL. Velvetech has its developers strategically distributed in 10+ global technical job markets to deliver the best in class software engineering and exceptional client services. We have 20+ years of experience in software and hardware development for clients all around the world, especially for US clients. As an official Microsoft Gold Partner, our company is listed in the top 5 software development companies in Illinois, USA.

Areas of expertise are consulting, development, implementation, and support of software solutions. We implement modern backend solutions that support microservices architecture with the following technologies: NET Core, Node.js, Java, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, RabbitMQ. For the web UI front-end development, we opt for React, or Angular, and for mobile development — Swift, Kotlin, Java. Most of the systems are designed for cloud infrastructures like AWS, Azure, GCP, and heavily rely on Docker, Kubernetes while modern CI/CD is made using GitLab CI or TeamCity. In September 2021, Velvetech LLC received the status of the official Training Provider of the International Institute of Business Analysis. This status gives us the right to conduct regular quality trainings for Business Analysts and anyone performing BA activities regardless their job title.

Principles are based on Agile Methodology, Scrum and Kanban. Various projects coded in GitLab or GitHub are built with multiple coordinated teams, collaborating via Jira, Confluence, MS Teams, and Slack. Velvetech constantly follows the Tech trends and actively cooperates with startups in such breakthrough areas as Machine Learning, the Internet of Things, Blockchain, FPGA, and AI.

Responsibilities
Work with clients to gather and analyze their business requirements
Design and configure Creatio solutions using low-code tools
Develop and customize workflows, user interfaces, and business logic within Creatio
Conduct thorough testing to ensure the quality and functionality of implemented solutions
Provide training and support to clients during and after the developing and implementation process
Create comprehensive documentation for implemented solutions and processes
Collaborate with business analysts, developers, and other stakeholders to ensure successful project delivery
Requirements
Creatio certification is required
At least 3+ years of experience in developing and implementing IT solutions, preferably with CRM or BPM platforms
Strong understanding of business process modeling and data integration methods
Proficiency in using no-code development tools for system customization
Deep knowledge of Creatio architecture, C#, JS, Angular
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Strong communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously
English knowledge at Intermediate level or higher
Benefits
Velvetech is in the TOP 5 development companies in the USA
You have FLEXIBLE working conditions and a COOPERATIVE environment
A COMPETITIVE and performance-based salary, fair compensation and benefits
Many CHALLENGING and exciting projects with new opportunities and learning
GROWTH opportunities, skills and competencies improvement, and professional certification
In-company TRAINING (English, Software / DevOps / Project management / Design / Business)
Our team

We are a friendly team of 170+ professionals where everyone is able to achieve high results and grows professionally not only due to their own knowledge and skills but also with the support of colleagues. Values that we highly appreciate are high performance, responsibility, respect, and loyalty. In order to have a highly motivated team, Velvetech invests in their people, additional education, certification, and others. You choose your career path and we are here to support you!

People work together in harmony, encouraging each other to continuously learn, progress, and pursue perfection. Our employees enjoy working as we turn challenges into advantages to share success with each other.

You have a chance to become a part of a friendly and professional team that creates robust software solutions to deliver maximum value to our international clients.

title: Бизнес-аналитик
AI Архитектор
description:
Задачи, которые ты будешь выполнять:

Проектирование AI/ML-систем:

Участие во всех стадиях проектирования / разработки архитектуры и стратегии внедрения высоконагруженных AI/ML-решений (NLP, LLM, Computer Vision, Predictive Analytics, Generative AI и др.).
Выбор оптимальных алгоритмов, моделей и фреймворков под бизнес-задачи.
Участие в интеграции AI-компонентов в существующие IT-системы (микросервисы, системы, процессы).

Работа с данными:

Проектирование Data Pipelines для обучения и инференса моделей.
Обеспечение корректности, безопасности и эффективности обработки данных.

Инфраструктура и DevOps для AI:

Понимание и участие во всех этапах настройки MLOps-процессов (CI/CD для моделей, мониторинг, A/B-тестирование).
Работа с облачными платформами (Azure ML) и on-premise-решениями.

Исследования и инновации:

Анализ state-of-the-art решений в AI/ML.
Эксперименты с новыми подходами (LLM, мультимодальные модели, автономные агенты).

Технические требования (Hard Skills):

Программирование:

Python (основной язык), экспертные знание PyTorch.
Опыт работы с CUDA, оптимизацией вычислений (например, ONNX).

ML/Deep Learning:

Понимание архитектур нейросетей (Transformer, CNN, RNN, Diffusion Models и др.).
Практический опыт fine-tuning и deployment моделей (включая LLM: GPT, Llama, Mistral и др.).

Инфраструктура:

Docker, Kubernetes, Airflow, MLflow, Kubeflow.
Реляционные и NoSQL БД, векторные базы (Oracle, Postgres, FAISS, MongoDB).

Облака и Big Data:

Опыт с Azure, Spark, Hadoop, Kafka.

Гибкие навыки (Soft Skills):

Коммуникация:

Умение объяснять сложные концепции нетехническим стейкхолдерам, умение мотивировать целесообразность выбранного стека / технологий.

Управление проектами:

Знание Agile/Scrum, работа с Jira/Confluence.

Лидерство:

Способность принимать решения в условиях неопределённости.

Нам по пути, если у тебя есть:

Стать частью IT-команды международного банка
Офис, где приятно работать и крутых наставников, коллег
Конкурентоспособную заработную плату
Возможность повышения квалификации (внутренние и внешние обучения)
Система льгот для сотрудников – OLJA: ежемесячные лимиты на спорт, здоровье, саморазвитие или на заботу о семье.

title: Full stack разработчик (frontend, backend)
description:
Ищем талантливого фулл-стак разработчика в команду GuardinAI. Данная роль требует сочетания навыков разработки как фронтенда, так и бэкенда, что включает в себя разработку и оптимизацию нашего веб-приложения, предназначенного для B2B клиентов. Идеальный кандидат должен быть опытен в управлении и масштабировании веб-приложений, и в быстрой работе с фронтендом и бэкендом, чтобы удовлетворить растущие потребности наших клиентов. Умение и желание постоянно учиться и открывать новые технологии и методы обязательно.

Обязанности:

Разработка и поддержка компонентов фронтенда и бэкенда нашего веб-приложения.

Сотрудничество с мультидисциплинарными командами для определения, проектирования и реализации новых функций.

Обеспечение производительности, качества, безопасности и отзывчивости приложений.

Интеграция с решениями для хранения данных, преимущественно с PostgreSQL.

Поддержание целостности кода и организации с использованием Git.

Использование Amazon Web Services (AWS) для решений масштабируемой инфраструктуры.

Обслуживание и поддержка существующих функциональностей для повышения производительности.

Следование текущим тенденциям и новым технологиям в индустрии для их применения в рамках роли.

Работа с клиентами из США и Европы
Разработка и поддержка фронтенд-части веб-приложения на ReactJS.

Тесное взаимодействие с дизайнером и бэкенд-разработчиком для реализации пользовательского интерфейса.

Оптимизация и расширение приложения.

Предложение и реализация новых идей для улучшения проекта.

Стремление учиться и бросать вызов самому себе

Требования:

Владение фреймворками JavaScript: React.js и Vue.js.

Значительный опыт работы с бэкендом на Node.js и Express.

Опыт работы с AWS и современными процессами развертывания.

Знание систем управления реляционными базами данных, предпочтительно PostgreSQL.

Глубокое понимание системы контроля версий Git.

Квалификация:

Степень бакалавра в области компьютерных наук, программирования, Информатики, Математики, Искусственного интеллекта, Машинного обучения или в смежной области; предпочтительно наличие степени магистра.

Не менее 2-3 лет профессионального опыта в полноценной разработке.

Отличные аналитические способности и навыки решения проблем.

Высокий уровень коммуникативных навыков и владение английским языком на уровне В2 и свободное владение русским.

Внимание к деталям и стремление к достижению поставленных целей;

Условия:

Испытательный период: 3 месяца;

Возможно оформление по ГПХ


Company Overview:
Join us at GuardinAI, a startup dedicated to solving Trust & Safety problems by leveraging advanced AI/ML technologies. We are building and offering a suite of robust web-application solutions for B2B clients.

Job Description:
We are seeking a talented Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic team. This role
requires a mix of front-end and back-end development skills, contributing to the
development and optimization of our web-based AI solutions. The ideal candidate will
be adept in managing and scaling web applications to meet the evolving needs of our
global clients.


Responsibilities:
● Develop and maintain the front-end and back-end components of our web
application.
● Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
● Ensure the performance, quality, security, and responsiveness of our web-application application.
● Integrate with data storage solutions (PostgreSQL and others).
● Maintain code integrity and organization using Git; follow code change best practices.
● Utilize Amazon Web Services (AWS) for scalable infrastructure solutions.
● Provide maintenance and support for existing functionalities to enhance
performance.
● Keep up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends to apply them
within the role.


Technical Skills:
● Proficiency in JavaScript frameworks: React.js and Vue.js.
● Strong backend knowledge and experience with Node.js and Express.
● Experience with AWS and modern deployment workflows (S3, Cloudfront, Route53, and others).
● Familiarity with relational database management systems, preferably
PostgreSQL (or MySQL, etc).
● Solid understanding of Git for version control.


Qualifications:
● Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science; Master’s degree preferred.
● At least 2-3 years of professional experience in full-stack development.
● Strong analytical skills and problem-solving aptitude; curious and always learning new things.
● Excellent communication skills and proficiency in English (B2 level at least)

title: Manager Performance Marketing
description:
PURPOSE AND OVERALL RELEVANCE TO ORGANIZATION

The Manager Performance Marketing EMC will be responsible for consulting on and monitoring eCommerce campaigns to deliver innovative and leading executions according to brand guidelines and business objectives as well as amplify campaigns to drive quality Traffic, Installs and Net sales on the adidas eCommerce site and app through SEM, Affiliates, Display and Paid social.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

Support in developing specific and measurable performance marketing strategies across running, training, Originals and commercial moments across the EMC to meet monthly, quarterly, and yearly Net sales targets.
Work cross-functionally with franchise partner marketing teams, site operations and analytics to create synergies and explore and exploit opportunities to drive traffic, installs and hit acquisition targets.
Support in finding new & innovative ways to expand eCommerce business and deliver on site and app revenue goals.
Support in managing relationships with media, creative agencies and franchise partners.
Work closely with Digital Brand, Brand Comms and eCommerce team to drive testing, reporting, optimisations and analysis on channel performance to identify key levers and opportunities for improvements. Share with global and other market teams to help educate and learn.
Assist CRM Manager in managing top and bottom-line growth of CRM acquisition to build lasting digital connections with consumers.
Lead Digital performance marketing analytics and dashboarding.
Lead creative strategies across all paid channels. KPI’S
Managing and reporting on monthly performance media campaigns’ KPIs
Traffic, Installs, Revenue, and cost of sale targets
Consumer Sentiment Tracking
Brand Health KPIS (Brand momentum, Net Promoter Score, Spontaneous purchase intent, etc.)

KEY RELATIONSHIPS

Hub: Digital team, BA team
Regional: MENA teams
Local Internal: Digital, eCommerce, Brand Comms, Omnichannel teams
Local Externals: Agencies & Partners

KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND ABILITIES

Cross-functional Marketing knowledge in sport and/or fashion/lifestyle categories (FMCG or sporting goods industry candidates preferred).
Experience in Performance Marketing: Search Engine Marketing, Affiliate Marketing, Display, Programmatic Media and Paid Social Media Buying and Planning.
Experience in web and app analytical tools: Google Analytics, Adobe analytics, Appsflyer
Curious and passionate about eCommerce and Digital Marketing and the interaction of the different channels. Comfortable with the rapid evolution of (marketing) technology and excited to continue to develop and enhance knowledge, skills and experience. Experience with attribution modelling is a plus.
Ability to handle complexity and remain mature, responsible and calm under pressure.
Logical thinker, able to synthesize knowledge, data and experience to develop and communicate solid conclusions and recommendations.
Strong (written and verbal) communication and interpersonal skills. Clear communicator that is collaborative and able to build strong relationships quickly.
Strong time management, organizational, planning and prioritization skills. Diligence, attention to detail and a strong work ethic.
Data driven, with experience in relevant web analytics platforms (e.g. Google Analytics & Adobe Analytics) with strong quantitative and qualitative analytical skills.
Advanced computer skills, proven experience in Excel. REQUISITE EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE / MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS
University degree in Marketing/Media and a proven previous experience (minimum 5 years) in either agency (Digital, eCommerce) or a client side Performance Marketing role.
Fluency in English and Russian/Kazhak both spoken and written is mandatory.

title: Dynamics 365 CRM/CE Functional Consultant

title: Middle/Senior DevSecOps инженер
